Article Title: Sacha Baron Cohen’s representative responds to Rebel Wilson claims
Sentence:
CNN —

Rebel Wilson is claiming Sacha Baron Cohen has tried to stop the release of her upcoming memoir, “Rebel Rising.”

Wilson and Baron Cohen starred together “The Brothers Grimsby” in 2016.

Article Title: Sacha Baron Cohen’s representative responds to Rebel Wilson claims
Sentence: “I will not be bullied or silenced with high priced lawyer or PR crisis managers,” Wilson wrote on her Instagram stories on Monday.

Article Title: Sacha Baron Cohen’s representative responds to Rebel Wilson claims
Sentence: “The ‘a**hole’ that I am talking about in ONE CHAPTER of my book is Sacha Baron Cohen.”

Article Title: Sacha Baron Cohen’s representative responds to Rebel Wilson claims
Sentence: Without naming Baron Cohen, Wilson had previously written on social media: “He’s trying to stop press coming out about my new book.

Article Title: Sacha Baron Cohen’s representative responds to Rebel Wilson claims
Sentence: But the book WILL come out and you will all know the truth.”

Article Title: Sacha Baron Cohen’s representative responds to Rebel Wilson claims
Sentence: In her posts, Wilson did not specify what she wrote about Baron Cohen.

Article Title: Sacha Baron Cohen’s representative responds to Rebel Wilson claims
Sentence: However, a spokesperson for the comedian and actor told CNN Wilson’s claims are false.

Article Title: Sacha Baron Cohen’s representative responds to Rebel Wilson claims
Sentence: “While we appreciate the importance of speaking out, these demonstrably false claims are directly contradicted by extensive detailed evidence, including contemporaneous documents, film footage, and eyewitness accounts from those present before, during and after the production of The Brothers Grimsby,” the spokesperson said.

Article Title: Sacha Baron Cohen’s representative responds to Rebel Wilson claims
Sentence: “When I first came to Hollywood, people were like, yeah, ‘I have a no a**hole policy, means like,

Article Title: Sacha Baron Cohen’s representative responds to Rebel Wilson claims
Sentence: I don’t work with a**holes.’

Article Title: Sacha Baron Cohen’s representative responds to Rebel Wilson claims
Sentence: I mean, that sounds sensible or logical.

Article Title: Sacha Baron Cohen’s representative responds to Rebel Wilson claims
Sentence: But then it really sunk in because I worked with a massive a**hole and

Article Title: Sacha Baron Cohen’s representative responds to Rebel Wilson claims
Sentence: yeah, now I definitely have a no a**holes policy,” Wilson said in a video shared on Instagram earlier this month.

Article Title: Sacha Baron Cohen’s representative responds to Rebel Wilson claims
Sentence: In a 2016 interview with UK Marie Claire, Wilson spoke about Baron Cohen wanting her to film a nude scene in “The Brothers Grimsby,” which she declined.

Article Title: Sacha Baron Cohen’s representative responds to Rebel Wilson claims
Sentence: “You want to know that the people (behind the camera) have a certain sensibility and decency,” Wilson said at the time.

Article Title: Sacha Baron Cohen’s representative responds to Rebel Wilson claims
Sentence:
“And a lot of times in comedy they’re not those people.”

“Rebel Rising” is due to release on April 2.

Article Title: Why are bidets just now getting popular in America?
Sentence:
New York CNN —

Bring up installing a bidet to the average American before the pandemic, and they might have likely flushed the idea straightaway.

Article Title: Why are bidets just now getting popular in America?
Sentence: The bathroom washer business, once a foreign concept to many in the US, experienced a huge boom during the Covid-19 pandemic, when shoppers were battling over toilet paper shortages.

Article Title: Why are bidets just now getting popular in America?
Sentence: But while some products or industries saw a boom during Covid that later came back down to earth –- say, masks, roller skates, pet adoptions, Zoom subscriptions, Peloton bikes -– bidets made a big splash and have managed to maintain sales growth.

Article Title: Why are bidets just now getting popular in America?
Sentence: Bidets and their product cousins – washlets, “bum guns” and other water-based alternatives to toilet paper – are universal in most parts of the world; bidet enthusiasts tout how the devices are more sustainable, clean, and less abrasive.

Article Title: Why are bidets just now getting popular in America?
Sentence: But Americans just can’t seem to let go of the Charmin Bear.

Article Title: Why are bidets just now getting popular in America?
Sentence: It took a toilet paper shortage for some to come around to the 18th-century invention.

Article Title: Why are bidets just now getting popular in America?
Sentence: During the pandemic, every single bidet sold out at bidetking.com, and the business grew exponentially, bidetking.com founder James Lin said.

Article Title: Why are bidets just now getting popular in America?
Sentence: The site faced a massive supply crunch, and it had to air freight costly containers to meet demands.

Article Title: Why are bidets just now getting popular in America?
Sentence: Lin described shipments of products from abroad by water completely selling out before they even hit the warehouse.

Article Title: Why are bidets just now getting popular in America?
Sentence: By some estimates, the entire bidet market grew two to three times during 2020.

Article Title: Why are bidets just now getting popular in America?
Sentence: Tushy, which makes a trendy bidet seat attachment, pulled in a revenue of $40 million in 2020 versus $8 million in 2019, founder Miki Agrawal said to CNN.

Article Title: Why are bidets just now getting popular in America?
Sentence: Americans are still intrigued by the bidet.

Article Title: Why are bidets just now getting popular in America?
Sentence: Bidetking.com reports sales have grown a minimum of 20% each year since the pandemic, with 2023 closer to 30%.

Article Title: Why are bidets just now getting popular in America?
Sentence:
A bidet for every bum

A dizzying array of bidet options confront the burgeoning American consumer.

Article Title: Why are bidets just now getting popular in America?
Sentence: Big spenders can find luxury options to give their porcelain throne the royal treatment.

Article Title: Why are bidets just now getting popular in America?
Sentence: Japanese electronic bidet seat maker Toto sells a “washlet” for as much as $1,420 on bidetking.com, equipped with a water heating system (that heats the toilet seat and the jet streams of water that clean the user’s backside), a wireless remote control (with multiple spray settings) and a hands-free dryer.

Article Title: Why are bidets just now getting popular in America?
Sentence: Tushy, defined by its whimsical marketing, sells a popular bidet attachment starting at $99.

Article Title: Why are bidets just now getting popular in America?
Sentence: Few people buy a bidet every year, so much of the growth is coming from new customers.

Article Title: Why are bidets just now getting popular in America?
Sentence: Often, bidet sales spread just through word of mouth.

Article Title: Why are bidets just now getting popular in America?
Sentence: Once one person is converted to the new method of bathroom sanitation, they want their friends and family to join the club.

Article Title: Why are bidets just now getting popular in America?
Sentence: And many of those customers often become entrenched rather than transient.

Article Title: Why are bidets just now getting popular in America?
Sentence: Some customers who start with more basic washer attachments are now upgrading to electronic models that have different temperature and pressure settings.

Article Title: Why are bidets just now getting popular in America?
Sentence: The most popular type of bidet in the US, Lin said, is a non-electric attachment that only sprays cold water, found for less than $50 on sites like Amazon.

Article Title: Why are bidets just now getting popular in America?
Sentence: Others have found an even cheaper alternative.

Article Title: Why are bidets just now getting popular in America?
Sentence: Joe from Michigan, who did not want to be identified by his last name, says he grabbed a bidet attached to a toilet being discarded on the side of the street, and purchased an adapter hose to fit it into his home (after sanitizing it).

Article Title: Why are bidets just now getting popular in America?
Sentence: “Gosh, I wish I would have known about it sooner,” Joe told CNN.

Article Title: Why are bidets just now getting popular in America?
Sentence:
A foreign concept from the start

The idea to use flowing water – rather than harder objects, whether leaves or paper – to clean one’s underside may be as old as human existence.

Article Title: Why are bidets just now getting popular in America?
Sentence: The bidet originated in France, used by aristocrats as a separate piece of furniture next to the chamber pot.

Article Title: Why are bidets just now getting popular in America?
Sentence: Variations of the bidet are ubiquitous in a large swath of Europe to the Middle East, East Asia and some South American countries.

Article Title: Why are bidets just now getting popular in America?
Sentence: During the booming electronics era, the Japanese brand Toto revolutionized the washlet in 1980 with a toilet seat attachment that uses warm water to cleanse.

Article Title: Why are bidets just now getting popular in America?
Sentence: The devices have proliferated to homes and businesses around Japan and beyond.

Article Title: Why are bidets just now getting popular in America?
Sentence: A common reason why bidets aren’t used in the US is that during World War 2, American soldiers saw brothels utilizing bidets.

Article Title: Why are bidets just now getting popular in America?
Sentence: When they came back to United States, they shunned the bidet because of the connotations.

Article Title: Why are bidets just now getting popular in America?
Sentence: Plus, the construction boom that took place in the post-war years built plumbing systems without bidets.

Article Title: Why are bidets just now getting popular in America?
Sentence: (Japanese washlets and other devices, however, connect to existing toilets and don’t require separate plumbing like French-style bidets.)

Article Title: Why are bidets just now getting popular in America?
Sentence: Bidet of Elisabeth of Bavaria (Carl Knoll Porcelain Factory, Carlsbad), 1887-1890.

Article Title: Why are bidets just now getting popular in America?
Sentence: Found in the collection of the Kammerhofmuseen der Stadt Gmunden.

Article Title: Why are bidets just now getting popular in America?
Sentence:
Fine Art Images/Heritage Images/Hulton Archive/Getty Images

The foreignness of bidets stuck.

Article Title: Why are bidets just now getting popular in America?
Sentence: Some of the new bidet users CNN interviewed said they had associated the object with places like Europe or Japan, or something found in fancy hotels.

Article Title: Why are bidets just now getting popular in America?
Sentence: When Joe and his wife lived in Spain, he initially didn’t even know what the unattached bidet in their apartment bathroom was used for.

Article Title: Why are bidets just now getting popular in America?
Sentence: Agrawal, the Tushy founder, said she was drawn to the bidet business because it was a standard practice she grew up in with an Indian father and Japanese mother.

Article Title: Why are bidets just now getting popular in America?
Sentence: Of course, for many, water-based cleanliness has long been entrenched in their culture, going back centuries.

Article Title: Why are bidets just now getting popular in America?
Sentence: For example, for practicing Muslims, the Islamic jurisprudence lays out strict guidelines on washing oneself.

Article Title: Why are bidets just now getting popular in America?
Sentence: Many Asian and Middle Eastern countries utilize “bum guns,” or low-cost handheld sprayers attached by a hose to the side of the toilet, or jugs that look like watering cans.

Article Title: Why are bidets just now getting popular in America?
Sentence: Eyad Atieh, a resident physician in Illinois, spent part of his childhood and adolesence in Jordan, where every house had a bidet installed.

Article Title: Why are bidets just now getting popular in America?
Sentence: In his medical training, he learned the bidet’s health benefits, especially for those who suffer from hemorrhoids and hernias.

Article Title: Why are bidets just now getting popular in America?
Sentence: “A big part of our culture is using water to clean, otherwise you can’t pray, you can’t be considered clean Islamically,” Atieh said.

Article Title: Why are bidets just now getting popular in America?
Sentence:
Big Toilet Paper

When the great toilet paper shortage hit in 2020, many Americans realized there could be another way to clean themselves.

Article Title: Why are bidets just now getting popular in America?
Sentence: Environmental concerns around trees, paper and waste perhaps also played a role.

Article Title: Why are bidets just now getting popular in America?
Sentence: Using toilet paper had seemed, somehow, American, with toilet paper jokes a staple in bathroom humor and “TP-ing” a stereotypical rite of passage for teens.

Article Title: Why are bidets just now getting popular in America?
Sentence: And little is more American than the Charmin bear, an industry emblem that already dominates aisles of supermarkets.

Article Title: Why are bidets just now getting popular in America?
Sentence: So, “getting consumers to do something different, they have to undo all those brand associations (with toilet paper) and all those habits they have,” Derek Rucker, a marketing professor at Kellogg School of Management told CNN.

Article Title: Why are bidets just now getting popular in America?
Sentence: Rucker said the bidet industry would need to become a social norm in the US, such as being built into more new home constructions.

Article Title: Why are bidets just now getting popular in America?
Sentence: Many bidet users in the US were converted after visiting societies where bidet use is widespread.

Article Title: Why are bidets just now getting popular in America?
Sentence: Mikaela Koelzer, in Chicago, visited Japan the summer before the pandemic and was awestruck by the variety of bidet settings in even the most hole-in-the-wall restaurants.

Article Title: Why are bidets just now getting popular in America?
Sentence: Then the pandemic hit, and Koelzer had “nothing but time” to find “pockets of joy” in her day.

Article Title: Why are bidets just now getting popular in America?
Sentence: With the toilet paper mania, she decided to kill two birds with one stone and splurge on a Tushy.

Article Title: Why are bidets just now getting popular in America?
Sentence: “It moreso was just about nurturing myself and feeling like I was doing something good for myself in a way that I could control, because everything else was just so out of control,” Koelzer said.

Article Title: Why are bidets just now getting popular in America?
Sentence: Though Koelzer has a basic Tushy, her parents are now looking into a more state-of-the-art one that has temperature controls, she says.

Article Title: Why are bidets just now getting popular in America?
Sentence: Two of her friends are now “proud bidet owners.”

Article Title: Foam rollers: The must-have tool for soothing sore muscles
Sentence: Editor’s note: Dana Santas, known as the “Mobility Maker,” is a certified strength and conditioning specialist and mind-body coach in professional sports, and is the author of the book “Practical Solutions for Back Pain Relief.”

Article Title: Foam rollers: The must-have tool for soothing sore muscles
Sentence:
CNN —

Have your legs ever been so stiff and tired that simply bending down to tie your shoes felt like a Herculean task?

Article Title: Foam rollers: The must-have tool for soothing sore muscles
Sentence: Whether muscular discomfort comes from an intense workout or too much sitting, wanting to soothe sore muscles is a shared human experience.

Article Title: Foam rollers: The must-have tool for soothing sore muscles
Sentence: But because it’s an unrealistic luxury for most of us to receive daily massages or splurge on the latest high-tech massage gun, we need a more practical option.

Article Title: Foam rollers: The must-have tool for soothing sore muscles
Sentence: Enter the foam roller: an affordable and accessible self-care solution that’s backed by science for its muscle-soothing benefits.

Article Title: Foam rollers: The must-have tool for soothing sore muscles
Sentence: With consistent use, this simple tool can be a game changer in how you feel and move.

Article Title: Foam rollers: The must-have tool for soothing sore muscles
Sentence: What is a foam roller?

Article Title: Foam rollers: The must-have tool for soothing sore muscles
Sentence: A foam roller, as its name implies, is a cylindrical piece of dense foam.

Article Title: Foam rollers: The must-have tool for soothing sore muscles
Sentence: Rollers come in a variety of sizes ranging from 1-4 feet (0.3-1.2 meters) in length and 5-10 inches (13-25 centimeters) in diameter.

Article Title: Foam rollers: The must-have tool for soothing sore muscles
Sentence: The handy cylinders also vary in degrees of firmness, surface textures and features designed to meet desired intensity levels and uses.

Article Title: Foam rollers: The must-have tool for soothing sore muscles
Sentence: The ubiquitous gym staple is available from most major department stores starting at prices as low as $5.

Article Title: Foam rollers: The must-have tool for soothing sore muscles
Sentence: Larger sizes and more features (like bumps or points) drive up the price but generally aren’t necessary to reap the science-backed benefits.

Article Title: Foam rollers: The must-have tool for soothing sore muscles
Sentence:
What does foam rolling do?

Considered a self-myofascial release tool, a foam roller can relieve soreness and inflammation, increase range of motion, alleviate muscular tension and release tight fascia — the thin layer of connective tissue under the skin surrounding muscles.

Article Title: Foam rollers: The must-have tool for soothing sore muscles
Sentence: Research is increasingly shedding more light on the effectiveness of foam rolling to improve how you feel and move.

Article Title: Foam rollers: The must-have tool for soothing sore muscles
Sentence: A comprehensive analysis of 49 studies found that engaging in foam-rolling sessions of 90 seconds to two minutes had the capacity to reduce muscle stiffness and increase range of motion.

Article Title: Foam rollers: The must-have tool for soothing sore muscles
Sentence: One longer-term study revealed that foam rolling focused on the backs of the legs three times per week for four weeks improved hamstring flexibility.

Article Title: Foam rollers: The must-have tool for soothing sore muscles
Sentence: And a smaller-scale study found foam rolling during exercise warm-up sessions to be more effective than both static and dynamic stretching for improving flexibility without hampering strength.

Article Title: Foam rollers: The must-have tool for soothing sore muscles
Sentence: While more research is warranted, current science on foam rolling shows promising benefits.

Article Title: Foam rollers: The must-have tool for soothing sore muscles
Sentence:
Muscle soreness: Considerations and safety tips

While foam rolling offers numerous benefits, it’s important to proceed with caution.

Article Title: Foam rollers: The must-have tool for soothing sore muscles
Sentence: Individuals who are pregnant or with conditions such as muscle tears, arthritis, osteoporosis, varicose veins, or any other existing injuries or conditions should seek guidance from their health care provider.

Article Title: Foam rollers: The must-have tool for soothing sore muscles
Sentence: Always practice body awareness when foam rolling to differentiate between general muscle soreness you feel after a workout or prolonged sitting versus cautionary discomfort due to a strain or injury that could be unsafe to roll.

Article Title: Foam rollers: The must-have tool for soothing sore muscles
Sentence: If you’re unsure about the source of your muscle soreness or whether foam rolling is safe for you, talk to your physical therapist or doctor.

Article Title: Foam rollers: The must-have tool for soothing sore muscles
Sentence: When selecting a foam roller, keep in mind your pressure tolerance.

Article Title: Foam rollers: The must-have tool for soothing sore muscles
Sentence: A harder or bumpier roller will increase sensation.

Article Title: Foam rollers: The must-have tool for soothing sore muscles
Sentence: Regardless of the type of roller, always avoid rolling directly over joints, bony areas (such as the neck or spine) or thin skin.

Article Title: Foam rollers: The must-have tool for soothing sore muscles
Sentence: Foam rolling can be part of any workout routine.

Article Title: Foam rollers: The must-have tool for soothing sore muscles
Sentence:
FreshSplash/E+/Getty Images

When, where and how to roll:

Incorporating foam rolling into your fitness routine or lifestyle can be simple with some practical guidance.

Article Title: Foam rollers: The must-have tool for soothing sore muscles
Sentence: Include foam rolling as part of your warm-ups prior to any fitness activities to increase blood flow to your muscles and enhance flexibility.

Article Title: Foam rollers: The must-have tool for soothing sore muscles
Sentence: As a strength and mobility coach in professional sports, I recommend that all of my athletes prep for their workouts by foam rolling.

Article Title: Foam rollers: The must-have tool for soothing sore muscles
Sentence: If you have a tendency for chronic tension or experience soreness after intense activity or prolonged sitting, use your foam roller to address the areas of discomfort.

Article Title: Foam rollers: The must-have tool for soothing sore muscles
Sentence: Personally, I keep a foam roller in my office and use it on my back, glutes and hamstrings after any long bouts of sitting at my desk.

Article Title: Foam rollers: The must-have tool for soothing sore muscles
Sentence: Below I’ve outlined areas you can safely target with your foam roller.

Article Title: Foam rollers: The must-have tool for soothing sore muscles
Sentence: Place the roller on the ground and use your body weight to apply rolling pressure (like flattening a piece of dough with a rolling pin).

Article Title: Foam rollers: The must-have tool for soothing sore muscles
Sentence: Choose areas that make the most sense for you based on what you’re feeling and any activities you plan to do right after rolling.

Article Title: Foam rollers: The must-have tool for soothing sore muscles
Sentence: Roll each of your targeted areas for at least 90 seconds, starting with gentle pressure and gradually increasing intensity as you feel comfortable.

Article Title: Foam rollers: The must-have tool for soothing sore muscles
Sentence: Consistency is key — aim for three or more foam-rolling sessions per week to realize lasting benefits.

Article Title: Foam rollers: The must-have tool for soothing sore muscles
Sentence:
Calves

With both hands on the floor behind you for support, rest your calves (back of lower legs) on the roller.

Article Title: Foam rollers: The must-have tool for soothing sore muscles
Sentence: Cross your legs at the ankle.

Article Title: Foam rollers: The must-have tool for soothing sore muscles
Sentence: Roll from just above your ankle to just below your knee.

Article Title: Foam rollers: The must-have tool for soothing sore muscles
Sentence: Repeat on the other side.

Article Title: Foam rollers: The must-have tool for soothing sore muscles
Sentence:
Hamstrings

Rest your hamstrings (back of upper legs) on the roller with both hands on the floor behind you for support.

Article Title: Foam rollers: The must-have tool for soothing sore muscles
Sentence: Bend one knee to place a foot on the roller.

Article Title: Foam rollers: The must-have tool for soothing sore muscles
Sentence: Roll your hamstrings from the fold of your glute (bottom) to just above the back of your knees.

Article Title: Foam rollers: The must-have tool for soothing sore muscles
Sentence: Repeat on the other side.

Article Title: Foam rollers: The must-have tool for soothing sore muscles
Sentence:
Glutes

Sitting on the roller, bend your leg to bring your foot to the opposite knee.

Article Title: Foam rollers: The must-have tool for soothing sore muscles
Sentence: Place a hand on the floor for support.

Article Title: Foam rollers: The must-have tool for soothing sore muscles
Sentence: Lean your weight into the bent-knee side and slowly roll the entire glute area (back and outside of your hip).

Article Title: Foam rollers: The must-have tool for soothing sore muscles
Sentence: Repeat on the other side.

Article Title: Foam rollers: The must-have tool for soothing sore muscles
Sentence:
IT band/outside of leg

From a side forearm plank, rest your lower leg on top of the roller and place your top foot on the floor for support.

Article Title: Foam rollers: The must-have tool for soothing sore muscles
Sentence: Roll from the outside of your hip to just above your knee.

Article Title: Foam rollers: The must-have tool for soothing sore muscles
Sentence: If the sensation is too intense, shift more weight into your supporting foot.

Article Title: Foam rollers: The must-have tool for soothing sore muscles
Sentence: To increase intensity, stack your legs.

Article Title: Foam rollers: The must-have tool for soothing sore muscles
Sentence:
Adductors/inside of leg

From a forearm plank position with your core engaged for support, slightly spread your legs and open one hip to align the roller on a slight diagonal along your adductors (inner thigh).

Article Title: Foam rollers: The must-have tool for soothing sore muscles
Sentence: Roll along the entire length of your adductors from the groins to just before the knee.

Article Title: Foam rollers: The must-have tool for soothing sore muscles
Sentence:
Quadriceps

Take a forearm plank position with your quadriceps (thighs) resting evenly on the roller.

Article Title: Foam rollers: The must-have tool for soothing sore muscles
Sentence: Engage core muscles and walk your forearms forward and back for support as you roll from just below your hips to just above your knees.

Article Title: Foam rollers: The must-have tool for soothing sore muscles
Sentence:
Back

Again, avoid rolling your cervical spine or neck area, and if you have any history of spinal injury or genetic spinal conditions, consult your doctor.

Article Title: Foam rollers: The must-have tool for soothing sore muscles
Sentence: Upper/midback: Lie on the roller with it positioned across your upper back.

Article Title: Foam rollers: The must-have tool for soothing sore muscles
Sentence: Keep both knees bent with your feet down and core engaged for support.

Article Title: Foam rollers: The must-have tool for soothing sore muscles
Sentence: Maintain a neutral neck position with your hands placed gently behind your head.

Article Title: Foam rollers: The must-have tool for soothing sore muscles
Sentence: Roll slowly from your upper back to the base of your ribcage.

Article Title: Foam rollers: The must-have tool for soothing sore muscles
Sentence: To increase intensity, cross your arms in front.

Article Title: Foam rollers: The must-have tool for soothing sore muscles
Sentence: Lower back: From the same position, roll from just above your hips to just below your ribs.

Article Title: Foam rollers: The must-have tool for soothing sore muscles
Sentence: Foam rolling is a simple yet powerful tool for soothing sore muscles, improving range of motion and enhancing recovery.

Article Title: Foam rollers: The must-have tool for soothing sore muscles
Sentence: By understanding its benefits, following practical guidance, and prioritizing safety, you can harness its full potential to help you feel and move better.

Article Title: Foam rollers: The must-have tool for soothing sore muscles
Sentence: Our seven-part guide will help you ease into a healthy routine, backed by experts.

Article Title: Could real estate go the way of the travel industry? Not just yet
Sentence:
CNN —

Technology has revolutionized how people book travel, buy groceries and manage their everyday finances.

Article Title: Could real estate go the way of the travel industry? Not just yet
Sentence: Yet, the process of buying a home has withstood many similar changes.

Article Title: Could real estate go the way of the travel industry? Not just yet
Sentence: Sites like Redfin and Zillow provide a way for buyers and brokers to connect online, but the role of real estate agents in closing purchases has persisted.

Article Title: Could real estate go the way of the travel industry? Not just yet
Sentence: Now the seismic settlement between the National Association of Realtors and home sellers could change that, as home buyers and sellers face the prospect of paying their agents separately, instead of sellers paying a commission split between both sides.

Article Title: Could real estate go the way of the travel industry? Not just yet
Sentence: That, in turn, opens the door for new technology to reshape the agents’ role, as people in other jobs — from the world of finance to travel — have already experienced.

Article Title: Could real estate go the way of the travel industry? Not just yet
Sentence: Given the settlement, Tomasz Piskorski, a professor of real estate at Columbia Business School, said buyers’ agents might see their work simplified through technology consumers can use themselves, similar to changes in money management.

Article Title: Could real estate go the way of the travel industry? Not just yet
Sentence: “I think we are reaching a point where there’s going to be a lot of innovation in the housing market,” Piskorski said.

Article Title: Could real estate go the way of the travel industry? Not just yet
Sentence:
“One simple idea is: Do homeowners really need a real estate agent?”

Nearly half of home buyers began their search online, according to a 2023 report by the NAR, and many buyers do home research themselves.

Article Title: Could real estate go the way of the travel industry? Not just yet
Sentence: “Ultimately, people will understand what real estate agents really do, especially on the buy side,” Piskorski said.

Article Title: Could real estate go the way of the travel industry? Not just yet
Sentence:
“The whole business model actually under which we operate right now makes these fees not very transparent to home buyers.”

Danielle Hale, chief economist at Realtor.com, told CNN in an email that technology could make things easier for buyers in an industry that has often been opaque.

Article Title: Could real estate go the way of the travel industry? Not just yet
Sentence: “Ultimately, if these changes bring about greater consumer transparency, that’s a good thing,” Hale told CNN.

Article Title: Could real estate go the way of the travel industry? Not just yet
Sentence: But even with the possibility of major changes, Hale said, one thing will almost certainly remain the same for real estate agents.

Article Title: Could real estate go the way of the travel industry? Not just yet
Sentence: Buyers, she noted, “will likely be reluctant to navigate the financial decision of a lifetime without their professional expertise and support.”

Article Title: Could real estate go the way of the travel industry? Not just yet
Sentence:
Finance, travel and other models

The NAR settlement essentially decouples the buyers’ and sellers’ agents.

Article Title: Could real estate go the way of the travel industry? Not just yet
Sentence: While previously home sellers have paid a commission (generally 5% to 6%) that was split between agents, the settlement makes it so home buyers might be on the hook for paying their agent up front.

Article Title: Could real estate go the way of the travel industry? Not just yet
Sentence: Experts told CNN that could affect how home buyers think about enlisting an agent.

Article Title: Could real estate go the way of the travel industry? Not just yet
Sentence: Currently, the framework of real estate solely emphasizes the buy and sell transaction, said John Bodrozic, co-founder of HomeZada, a real estate tech company.

Article Title: Could real estate go the way of the travel industry? Not just yet
Sentence: Yet, as technology simplifies the process, agents will have to advertise their value as long-term consultants in a niche industry.

Article Title: Could real estate go the way of the travel industry? Not just yet
Sentence: Bodrozic said tech will enable real estate to become more like personal finance in this sense.

Article Title: Could real estate go the way of the travel industry? Not just yet
Sentence: “I really believe it’s a bigger picture here, which is the opportunity for the real estate industry to think of their clients as a never-ending client that I want to keep happy and provide value to throughout their entire journey,” he said.

Article Title: Could real estate go the way of the travel industry? Not just yet
Sentence: Bobby Juncosa, chief technology officer of Edgewise, a real estate tech company, said there are lessons from how travel agents changed as technology has allowed people to search for, compare and purchase flights on their own.

Article Title: Could real estate go the way of the travel industry? Not just yet
Sentence: “The buyers’ agent will become, this is the part that’s a little bit more controversial, but a little bit more travel agent-esque, and they’re kind of pointing you in the right direction,” he said.

Article Title: Could real estate go the way of the travel industry? Not just yet
Sentence: “You know, ‘this neighborhood has good schools,’ all things that are public information that you could find out on your own, but you’re hoping for that local expertise.”

Article Title: Could real estate go the way of the travel industry? Not just yet
Sentence: A lot of real estate transactions could be digitized, and this settlement may provide impetus for that, Piskorski said.

Article Title: Could real estate go the way of the travel industry? Not just yet
Sentence:
He said developments in tech that organize home inspections, make arrangements to hire lawyers or fulfill other duties of a buyers’ agent, would “significantly reduce the costs associated with home transactions.”

Even as technology expands further into the real estate industry, Piskorski said he thinks a fully automated process, such as an Amazon marketplace for buying and selling homes, is still far in the distance.

Article Title: Could real estate go the way of the travel industry? Not just yet
Sentence: The real estate market, he said, is “too complex to be completely automated on a computer.”

Article Title: Could real estate go the way of the travel industry? Not just yet
Sentence: Juncosa said as the industry adjusts to the settlement rules, agents will become more like consultants throughout the home buying process, offering value-add insight.

Article Title: Could real estate go the way of the travel industry? Not just yet
Sentence: Yet what ultimately differentiates a travel agent from a real estate agent is the value and risk associated with the purchase.

Article Title: Could real estate go the way of the travel industry? Not just yet
Sentence: Purchasing a home is a major life decision, and some people will always benefit from the assurance of a broker, Juncosa said.

Article Title: Could real estate go the way of the travel industry? Not just yet
Sentence: A key point of home buying is the behavioral aspect, Piskorski said.

Article Title: Could real estate go the way of the travel industry? Not just yet
Sentence: “Some households just want a human being to be with them, to assure them that this is the right decision,” he said.

Article Title: Could real estate go the way of the travel industry? Not just yet
Sentence: Ultimately, Juncosa said that agents serve a fundamentally human purpose: reassuring homebuyers about the biggest financial decisions of their lives.

Sentence: That’s the kind of thing that would have to be disclosed ahead of time because it would impact potential buyers of the stock.

Article Title: Trump is about to get $3 billion richer after deal is approved to take his company public. But it won’t solve his cash crunch
Sentence: “He can’t do this quietly.

Article Title: Trump is about to get $3 billion richer after deal is approved to take his company public. But it won’t solve his cash crunch

”

Article Title: Navy Federal says external review finds ‘non-race factors’ explained mortgage approval disparities
Sentence:
CNN —

The nation’s largest credit union said this week that an external review found it hadn’t considered race in mortgage underwriting, responding to CNN’s previous reporting about racial gaps in its mortgage approval rates.

Article Title: Navy Federal says external review finds ‘non-race factors’ explained mortgage approval disparities
Sentence: Navy Federal Credit Union, which has more than 13 million members and lends to military servicemembers, Department of Defense personnel, veterans and their families, said a review it commissioned from a civil rights lawyer “found no race-based decision making in our mortgage underwriting” and that “legitimate, non-race factors” had largely explained racial differences in approval rates.

Article Title: Navy Federal says external review finds ‘non-race factors’ explained mortgage approval disparities
Sentence: A CNN investigation published in December found that Navy Federal approved more than 75% of the White borrowers who applied for a new conventional home purchase mortgage in 2022 while approving less than 50% of Black borrowers who applied for the same type of loan, according to the most recent federal data available from the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau.

Article Title: Navy Federal says external review finds ‘non-race factors’ explained mortgage approval disparities
Sentence: The nearly 29-percentage-point gap in Navy Federal’s approval rates was the widest of any of the 50 lenders that originated the most mortgage loans in 2022.

Article Title: Navy Federal says external review finds ‘non-race factors’ explained mortgage approval disparities
Sentence: The disparity remained even after accounting for more than a dozen different variables available in public mortgage data, including applicants’ income, debt-to-income ratio and property value, CNN’s review found.

Article Title: Navy Federal says external review finds ‘non-race factors’ explained mortgage approval disparities
Sentence: In addition, an analysis by staff of the Senate Banking Committee, which 10 Democratic senators cited in a letter asking federal regulators to review Navy Federal’s mortgage lending earlier this year, also found racial disparities in Navy Federal’s mortgage approval rates based on the publicly available data.

Article Title: Navy Federal says external review finds ‘non-race factors’ explained mortgage approval disparities
Sentence: Navy Federal said Thursday that an analysis it had commissioned by lawyer Debo Adegbile, a former member of the U.S. Commission on Civil Rights, found that those racial disparities were largely accounted for by examining “all non-public underwriting factors.”

Article Title: Navy Federal says external review finds ‘non-race factors’ explained mortgage approval disparities
Sentence: “Our review found that when all relevant factors are controlled for, which CNN did not do, the difference in approval rates between Black and White borrowers falls to less than 1%,” Adegbile said in a statement.

Article Title: Navy Federal says external review finds ‘non-race factors’ explained mortgage approval disparities
Sentence: “The remaining difference in approval rates is explained by legitimate, non-race factors like income verification and incomplete credit applications.”

Article Title: Navy Federal says external review finds ‘non-race factors’ explained mortgage approval disparities
Sentence: The analysis also accounted for other non-public factors including applicants’ credit scores, the statement said.

Article Title: Navy Federal says external review finds ‘non-race factors’ explained mortgage approval disparities
Sentence: A spokesperson for Navy Federal did not respond to a request for additional details about the analysis.

Article Title: Navy Federal says external review finds ‘non-race factors’ explained mortgage approval disparities
Sentence: As CNN previously reported, applicants’ credit scores are not available in the public mortgage data, and Navy Federal declined to provide CNN any data that would make it possible to analyze credit scores or other non-public factors.

Article Title: Navy Federal says external review finds ‘non-race factors’ explained mortgage approval disparities
Sentence: CNN’s analysis only included mortgage applications that were listed in the public data as being fully submitted and either approved or denied, and excluded those that were listed as “closed for incompleteness.”

Article Title: Navy Federal says external review finds ‘non-race factors’ explained mortgage approval disparities
Sentence: And while Navy Federal’s statement said its analysis included applicants’ debt-to-income ratios, CNN’s review also took those ratios, which are available in the public mortgage data, into account.

Article Title: Navy Federal says external review finds ‘non-race factors’ explained mortgage approval disparities
Sentence: Navy Federal described Adegbile’s analysis as an “external review,” but his law firm, WilmerHale, is also defending Navy Federal in a class-action lawsuit from Black and Latino borrowers who allege the credit union discriminated against them in mortgage applications.

Article Title: Navy Federal says external review finds ‘non-race factors’ explained mortgage approval disparities
Sentence: The same day that Navy Federal released a statement about the review, other lawyers from WilmerHale filed a motion to dismiss the lawsuit, which had cited CNN’s reporting.

Article Title: Navy Federal says external review finds ‘non-race factors’ explained mortgage approval disparities
Sentence: Attorneys for the credit union argued that the “alleged statistical disparities” the plaintiffs had cited were not sufficient to prove discrimination, and that they “fail to identify any Navy Federal policy or practice that caused any disparity.”

Article Title: Navy Federal says external review finds ‘non-race factors’ explained mortgage approval disparities
Sentence: The lawyers also argued that agreements the plaintiffs had signed when they became members of the credit union had required them to give Navy Federal adequate notice before filing a lawsuit, and that most had not done so.

Article Title: Navy Federal says external review finds ‘non-race factors’ explained mortgage approval disparities
Sentence: Adegbile’s analysis was not included in Navy Federal’s motion to dismiss the case.

Article Title: Navy Federal says external review finds ‘non-race factors’ explained mortgage approval disparities
Sentence: The plaintiffs’ attorneys – Ben Crump, Adam Levitt, and Hassan Zavareei – said in a statement that it was “a classic conflict of interest” for Adegbile to review Navy Federal’s practices at the same time his firm was defending the credit union in court.

Article Title: Navy Federal says external review finds ‘non-race factors’ explained mortgage approval disparities
Sentence: “Navy Federal should immediately put out the full investigative report and data analysis so that Navy Federal’s members have an opportunity for themselves to review the findings,” the statement said.

Article Title: Navy Federal says external review finds ‘non-race factors’ explained mortgage approval disparities
Sentence: In its statement, Navy Federal also said it was “currently examining initiatives to build on our mission of expanding access to credit for our diverse community of members and continue our efforts to address systemic barriers to homeownership.”

Article Title: Great Lakes small businesses and ski areas pivot following a record warm winter
Sentence:
Chicago CNN —

This winter, every morning that hotel owner Kelli Doyen looked outside her window, she hoped to see the Gwinn Model Towne Inn’s snowmobile caked in snow.

Article Title: Great Lakes small businesses and ski areas pivot following a record warm winter
Sentence: “We are one of only four properties that has a snowmobile trail right off the property,” said Doyen, who co-owns the hotel on Michigan’s Upper Peninsula with her husband.

Article Title: Great Lakes small businesses and ski areas pivot following a record warm winter
Sentence: In past seasons, that competitive advantage lured roughly 800 snowmobilers – it’s a top winter sport in northern states – to the hotel in Gwinn, Michigan, roughly 20 miles from Marquette.

Article Title: Great Lakes small businesses and ski areas pivot following a record warm winter
Sentence: This year, instead of fresh powder, too often Doyen said she saw a muddy path.

Article Title: Great Lakes small businesses and ski areas pivot following a record warm winter
Sentence: Now, as the season draws to a close, “We are down 70% over sales from last winter,” she said.

Article Title: Great Lakes small businesses and ski areas pivot following a record warm winter
Sentence: “We have had a pretty tough go of it.”

Article Title: Great Lakes small businesses and ski areas pivot following a record warm winter
Sentence: The 2023-2024 season marked the warmest winter on record for the lower 48 states, according to NOAA’s National Center for Environmental Information.

Article Title: Great Lakes small businesses and ski areas pivot following a record warm winter
Sentence: The change in the weather has had an outsize impact on the festivals, events and tourism that define the Great Lakes identity and produce the income of those living and working there.

Article Title: Great Lakes small businesses and ski areas pivot following a record warm winter
Sentence: All told, eight states experienced a record-warm season, including Wisconsin, Michigan, New York and Minnesota, plus North Dakota, Iowa, Vermont and New Hampshire.

Article Title: Great Lakes small businesses and ski areas pivot following a record warm winter
Sentence: Instead of a winter wonderland, the past several months have offered tourists less snow, less ice aind less opportunity for some outdoor activities.

Article Title: Great Lakes small businesses and ski areas pivot following a record warm winter
Sentence: Small businesses owners and regional industries scrambled to adapt.

Article Title: Great Lakes small businesses and ski areas pivot following a record warm winter
Sentence: Less outdoor ice skating might mean more indoor ice-skating.

Article Title: Great Lakes small businesses and ski areas pivot following a record warm winter
Sentence: Less snow-shoeing meant more pickleball in some places.

Article Title: Great Lakes small businesses and ski areas pivot following a record warm winter
Sentence: Doyen said the loss of income amounts to roughly $70,000.

Article Title: Great Lakes small businesses and ski areas pivot following a record warm winter
Sentence: She’s one of several business owners in the midwest whose winter sales keep them afloat until the summer tourism season begins.

Article Title: Great Lakes small businesses and ski areas pivot following a record warm winter
Sentence: Since purchasing the property in 2020 - just before Covid hit – Doyen said she has invested a bulk of her profit into renovations.

Article Title: Great Lakes small businesses and ski areas pivot following a record warm winter
Sentence: Operating expenses total $15,000 per month.

Article Title: Great Lakes small businesses and ski areas pivot following a record warm winter
Sentence: With the drop in bookings, her husband has pulled from his 401(k) to stay open.

Article Title: Great Lakes small businesses and ski areas pivot following a record warm winter
Sentence: “The last six months, I’ve spent every night here because I can’t afford to pay somebody to be here,” Doyen said.

Article Title: Great Lakes small businesses and ski areas pivot following a record warm winter
Sentence: “We’re down to our last $20,000 and we have to make it to June.”

Article Title: Great Lakes small businesses and ski areas pivot following a record warm winter
Sentence: “It’s depressing.

Article Title: Great Lakes small businesses and ski areas pivot following a record warm winter
Sentence: It’s exhausting.”

Article Title: Great Lakes small businesses and ski areas pivot following a record warm winter
Sentence:
Event and revenue meltdowns

With less snowfall, severe drought expanded over portions of Wisconsin and Michigan and increased in Iowa during the winter months, according to the US Drought Monitor.

Article Title: Great Lakes small businesses and ski areas pivot following a record warm winter
Sentence: The situation grew so dire that governors in Michigan, Minnesota, and Wisconsin announced businesses impacted by drought may be eligible for loans from the Small Business Administration.

Article Title: Great Lakes small businesses and ski areas pivot following a record warm winter
Sentence: “From skiing and snowshoeing to winter festivals, snowy winters are part of our way of life in Minnesota,” Gov. Tim Waltz said in a news release in March 7.

Article Title: Great Lakes small businesses and ski areas pivot following a record warm winter
Sentence:
“The low precipitation we’ve experienced this winter has had a real economic impact on small businesses that rely on snow and winter tourism to grow and survive.”

Susan Estler, CEO of Travel Marquette in Marquette, Michigan, told CNN hotel bookings between Christmas and March are down 16% this year.

Article Title: Great Lakes small businesses and ski areas pivot following a record warm winter
Sentence: “We are dependent on the snow for outdoor activities,” Estler said.

Article Title: Great Lakes small businesses and ski areas pivot following a record warm winter
Sentence: “Reservations are down.

Article Title: Great Lakes small businesses and ski areas pivot following a record warm winter
Sentence: Businesses are down.”

Article Title: Great Lakes small businesses and ski areas pivot following a record warm winter
Sentence: Sunlight reflects off of Lake Michigan at Montrose Harbor on an unseasonably warm day, Tuesday, Feb. 27, 2024, in Chicago.

Article Title: Great Lakes small businesses and ski areas pivot following a record warm winter
Sentence:
Erin Hooley/AP

Estler estimates roughly 30% of tourism dollars are spent on hotels.

Article Title: Great Lakes small businesses and ski areas pivot following a record warm winter
Sentence: That means the other 70% supports the local economy -– from gas stations to grocery stores to restaurants.

Article Title: Great Lakes small businesses and ski areas pivot following a record warm winter
Sentence: “All of those things have been impacted,” she said.

Article Title: Great Lakes small businesses and ski areas pivot following a record warm winter
Sentence: Data from the Bureau of Economic Analysis highlights the significance of climate, and of snow in particular, on business owners’ bottom line.

Article Title: Great Lakes small businesses and ski areas pivot following a record warm winter
Sentence: According to the BEA, snow activities in states clustered around the Great Lakes add hundreds of millions of dollars to the region’s economy.

Article Title: Great Lakes small businesses and ski areas pivot following a record warm winter
Sentence: For example, Wisconsin snow activities added $83.6 million in 2022, according to the BEA, and roughly $130 million in Michigan the same year.

Article Title: Great Lakes small businesses and ski areas pivot following a record warm winter
Sentence:
Adapting business plans

Some events that normally bring throngs of tourists to Marquette were forced to cancel this year.

Article Title: Great Lakes small businesses and ski areas pivot following a record warm winter
Sentence: That includes the UP200, a sled-dog race and qualifier for the famous Iditarod race in Alaska.

Article Title: Great Lakes small businesses and ski areas pivot following a record warm winter
Sentence: “Safety is our top priority and given the lack of snow and the warm temperatures, we cannot offer a safe race,” said Darlene Welch, UP200 President, in a statement on the UP200 website in February.

Article Title: Great Lakes small businesses and ski areas pivot following a record warm winter
Sentence: Estler noted the UP200 still held an outdoor festival instead of a race, an example of businesses quickly adapting to what may become a new normal.

Article Title: Great Lakes small businesses and ski areas pivot following a record warm winter
Sentence: “The time for adjustment is really now,” she said.

Article Title: Great Lakes small businesses and ski areas pivot following a record warm winter
Sentence: “Hopefully we will be getting an early spring and an early summer so

Article Title: Great Lakes small businesses and ski areas pivot following a record warm winter
Sentence: [businesses] can start recouping some of the money that they lost during the winter.”

Article Title: Great Lakes small businesses and ski areas pivot following a record warm winter
Sentence:
A road in Michigan during a snowy phase of winter in February 7, 2023 Christopher Germain

Christopher Germain, CEO of Lake Superior Community Partnership, said some ski areas have been offering summertime kayaking packages and outdoor space for special events and weddings to offset the loss in wintertime revenue.

Article Title: Great Lakes small businesses and ski areas pivot following a record warm winter
Sentence:
Germain added “Some of our small businesses are pairing up with each other to do special dining events.”

Partnerships and discounts

Germain, Estler, and Doyen are all transplants who moved to northern Michigan enchanted by the majesty of Upper Peninsula winters.

Article Title: Great Lakes small businesses and ski areas pivot following a record warm winter
Sentence: “I actually interviewed during the winter, toward the end of January, and it was just breathtakingly beautiful,” Estler said.

Article Title: Great Lakes small businesses and ski areas pivot following a record warm winter
Sentence: “The identity of the UP and especially Marquette is very much tied to the winter season and always has been.

Article Title: Great Lakes small businesses and ski areas pivot following a record warm winter
Sentence: So, it is quite unusual to have this.”

Article Title: Great Lakes small businesses and ski areas pivot following a record warm winter
Sentence: Doyen said one of the most difficult parts of her hotel’s emptiness is her inability to deliver more visitors, activities and, therefore, ancillary revenue for her neighbors.

Article Title: Great Lakes small businesses and ski areas pivot following a record warm winter
Sentence:
“The fact that we have been empty has hurt our community too,” Doyen said

Despite the challenges, Doyen still loves running the Inn, and plans to keep her doors open as long as possible.

Article Title: Great Lakes small businesses and ski areas pivot following a record warm winter
Sentence: “We actually care about our guests and care about our community.”

Article Title: Great Lakes small businesses and ski areas pivot following a record warm winter
Sentence: Doyen told CNN she also plans to offer a 20 percent discount through the spring months in hopes of bringing in more visitors.

Article Title: Great Lakes small businesses and ski areas pivot following a record warm winter
Sentence: Going forward, “You can’t plan around one season anymore,” Germain said.

Article Title: Mega Millions jackpot climbs to an estimated $1.1 billion after no grand prize winner Friday
Sentence:
CNN —

With no winner of the Mega Millions jackpot Friday, the grand prize for Tuesday’s drawing grew past the billion-dollar mark, according to the lottery.

Article Title: Mega Millions jackpot climbs to an estimated $1.1 billion after no grand prize winner Friday
Sentence: The jackpot for the next drawing on Tuesday night – an estimated $1.1 billion – marks the first time in seven months that the jackpot prize has topped $1 billion and only the sixth time in less than six years that the Mega Millions jackpot hit that threshold, according to the lottery.

Article Title: Mega Millions jackpot climbs to an estimated $1.1 billion after no grand prize winner Friday
Sentence: Friday’s winning numbers were: 3, 8, 31, 35, 44 and Mega Ball 16.

Article Title: Mega Millions jackpot climbs to an estimated $1.1 billion after no grand prize winner Friday
Sentence: While there was no big winner Friday, five tickets matched five of the numbers to win the game’s $1 million prize, Mega Millions said.

Article Title: Mega Millions jackpot climbs to an estimated $1.1 billion after no grand prize winner Friday
Sentence: Another player in Virginia won $3 million by activating the Megaplier, according to the lottery.

Article Title: Mega Millions jackpot climbs to an estimated $1.1 billion after no grand prize winner Friday
Sentence: If the jackpot is won next Tuesday, it would be the fifth largest prize in the history of the game, according to the lottery.

Article Title: Mega Millions jackpot climbs to an estimated $1.1 billion after no grand prize winner Friday
Sentence: In August 2023, $1.602 billion was won by a ticket that was purchased in Neptune Beach, Florida, according to the Mega Millions Jackpot history.

Article Title: Mega Millions jackpot climbs to an estimated $1.1 billion after no grand prize winner Friday
Sentence: It was the largest the jackpot prize ever won.

Article Title: Mega Millions jackpot climbs to an estimated $1.1 billion after no grand prize winner Friday
Sentence: There has not been a Mega Millions jackpot winner since December 2023, when a prize of $394 million was snagged by two players in California.

Article Title: Mega Millions jackpot climbs to an estimated $1.1 billion after no grand prize winner Friday
Sentence: Mega Millions’ five largest jackpots all exceeded $1 billion, the lottery said.

Article Title: Mega Millions jackpot climbs to an estimated $1.1 billion after no grand prize winner Friday
Sentence: Mega Millions drawings are held Tuesdays and Fridays at 11 p.m. ET.

Article Title: The genius Roman creations that still amaze us today
Sentence:
CNN —

Rome might not have built ancient history’s biggest empire – a shout out to Genghis for that one – but it was undoubtedly the most enduring and influential.

Article Title: The genius Roman creations that still amaze us today
Sentence: That’s because Roman passions for outrageous, oversized architecture went hand in hand with detailed record-keeping and relentless imperial PR.

Article Title: The genius Roman creations that still amaze us today
Sentence: As a result not only have a huge number of landmark sites survived to this day, but we also know a lot about them.

Article Title: The genius Roman creations that still amaze us today
Sentence: So grab your toga and follow us from the sands of Africa to the soggiest bits of the Scottish Borders to discover everything from spectacular triple-decker bridges and legendary stadiums to air-fried ancient pets and a huge German gate that didn’t actually work.

Article Title: The genius Roman creations that still amaze us today
Sentence:
Coliseum

What:

Article Title: The genius Roman creations that still amaze us today
Sentence:
The most iconic sports stadium of all

Where: Rome, Italy

Whoa: 80,000 seat Roman Super Bowl

When it comes to superlative Roman buildings, Rome’s own amphitheater is by far the most famous.

Article Title: The genius Roman creations that still amaze us today
Sentence: With a maximum seating capacity of 80,000, it’s the largest ancient amphitheater ever built.

Article Title: The genius Roman creations that still amaze us today
Sentence: The instantly recognizable four-story arched oval towers nearly 50 meters (160 feet) high, and was used for gladiatorial games that went on for days at a time.

Article Title: The genius Roman creations that still amaze us today
Sentence: The passages and rooms for waiting animals – up to 9,000 a show – and fighters can still be clearly seen under where the arena floor would have been.

Article Title: The genius Roman creations that still amaze us today
Sentence: We should warn you that the lines to get in now are likely even longer than the Roman ones though.

Article Title: The genius Roman creations that still amaze us today
Sentence: So either get there very early or just enjoy watching influencers fighting their own gladiator battles over the best selfie spots as the sun goes down.

Article Title: The genius Roman creations that still amaze us today
Sentence:
Fun fact: The floor of the Coliseum could be flooded with water for the enactment of “sea battles.”

Pompeii and Herculaneum

Many of Pompeii's treasures were baked into a state of perfect preservation.

Article Title: The genius Roman creations that still amaze us today
Sentence:
Marco Cantile/LightRocket/Getty Images

What: Volcanically immortalized Roman towns

Where: Naples, Italy

Whoa: The closest you’ll get to 2,000 years of time travel

Pliny the Younger’s story of the destruction of Pompeii and Herculaneum is the original disaster movie script.

Article Title: The genius Roman creations that still amaze us today
Sentence: It tells how the eruption of nearby Mount Vesuvius in 79 ACE buried the two towns in up to six meters of superheated ash in just two days.

Article Title: The genius Roman creations that still amaze us today
Sentence: That incinerated 1,000-plus inhabitants who hadn’t fled fast enough and even some of their pets.

Article Title: The genius Roman creations that still amaze us today
Sentence: It also literally baked buildings, paintings, artifacts and even food remains into a state of perfect preservation.

Article Title: The genius Roman creations that still amaze us today
Sentence: While it was forgotten for over 1,000 years, this UNESCO World Heritage site now gets over 2,500,000 visitors a year.

Article Title: The genius Roman creations that still amaze us today
Sentence: That’s still a positive though.

Article Title: The genius Roman creations that still amaze us today
Sentence: With the streets crowded with foreign voices and Roman shop signs and graffiti still vivid on the walls, you’ll instantly be transported back in time like no other site we know.

Article Title: The genius Roman creations that still amaze us today
Sentence: Funereal fact: Archaeologists have created haunting casts of Pompeii’s victims and their pets by filling the voids left in the solidified ash with plaster.

Article Title: The genius Roman creations that still amaze us today
Sentence:
Pont du Gard

What: Incredible triple-decker bridge

Where: Gardon River, France

Whoa: 360 meters long (1,181 feet), 50 meters high, over 2,000 years old

Not only is the Pont du Gard aqueduct breathtakingly beautiful, it’s also an incredible example of how meticulous Roman engineering and mathematics were.

Article Title: The genius Roman creations that still amaze us today
Sentence: While most of the Western world was still relying on wells for their water until a century ago, the Romans had running water for drinking, bathing and fountains 2,000 years ago.

Article Title: The genius Roman creations that still amaze us today
Sentence: The triple-decker aqueduct 50 meters above the river Gardon shows just how ingenious they could be in guaranteeing that supply too.

Article Title: The genius Roman creations that still amaze us today
Sentence: Not only is the arched architecture absolutely beautiful, but it’s created from such precisely cut stone it doesn’t even use mortar to hold it together.

Article Title: The genius Roman creations that still amaze us today
Sentence: Look closely and you can even see inscribed instructions as to where each stone (some as heavy as six tons) was meant to go in the grand design.

Article Title: The genius Roman creations that still amaze us today
Sentence: Fun fact: The overall water course length the aqueduct is part of is 50 kilometers long (30 miles) with an average gradient of just 1 in 3,000.

Article Title: The genius Roman creations that still amaze us today
Sentence:
Lepcis Magna

Lepcis Magna was once a thriving Roman port city.

Article Title: The genius Roman creations that still amaze us today
Sentence:
Mahmud Turkia/AFP/Getty Images

What: Spectacularly preserved Roman port

Where

Article Title: The genius Roman creations that still amaze us today
Sentence:
: Libyan coast

Whoa: Seeing is still not believing

The undoubted winner of the “most incredible Roman site you’ve never heard of” award is Lepcis Magna.

Article Title: The genius Roman creations that still amaze us today
Sentence: It might sound more like the scientific name of a rare animal, but this Libyan site is home to an unbelievably well-preserved Roman port.

Article Title: The genius Roman creations that still amaze us today
Sentence: Once a thriving city, flourishing on the trade from deeper Africa, Lepcis Magna was gradually swallowed up by desert sands after the Roman Empire collapsed.

Article Title: The genius Roman creations that still amaze us today
Sentence: It was barely disturbed for the next 1,500 years either, so the huge, column-lined forum, vast semi-circular theater overlooking the sea, multi-tier amphitheater and many stunning sculptures and murals have all survived almost intact.

Article Title: The genius Roman creations that still amaze us today
Sentence: Sadly, with many governments currently warning against travel to Libya, it’s one that most of us are better off viewing remotely for the time being.

Article Title: The genius Roman creations that still amaze us today
Sentence: Fun Fact: Lepcis Magna was the birthplace of emperor Septimus Severus and his majestic triumphal arch is the perfectly preserved gateway to the deserted city.

Article Title: The genius Roman creations that still amaze us today
Sentence:
Pantheon

What: Unique domed temple

Where: Rome, Italy

Whoa: Unbeaten Roman engineering

If it wasn’t for the queues looping right round the square in front of it, you might think the Pantheon was “just another big Roman temple.”

Article Title: The genius Roman creations that still amaze us today
Sentence: After all, the portico (front face) with its eight Corinthian columns and carved triangular top certainly look conventional enough.

Article Title: The genius Roman creations that still amaze us today
Sentence: Join the queue to get inside though, and the radical construction of this building becomes very clear.

Article Title: The genius Roman creations that still amaze us today
Sentence: The circular body of this temple-turned-church is topped with a stunning domed rotunda, complete with a central hole to let sunlight in.

Article Title: The genius Roman creations that still amaze us today
Sentence: The ceiling is awe-inspiring enough aesthetically to have you staring up in wonder, but there’s another reason to be blown away too.

Article Title: The genius Roman creations that still amaze us today
Sentence: At 43 meters (140 feet) in diameter, this historic half-sphere is still the largest unreinforced concrete dome in the world, nearly 2,000 years after it was made.

Article Title: The genius Roman creations that still amaze us today
Sentence: Fun fact: The base of the dome uses heavyweight travertine concrete while the top is lightweight tufa and pumice.

Article Title: The genius Roman creations that still amaze us today
Sentence:
Palatine Hill

The Palatine was once Rome's swankiest address.

Article Title: The genius Roman creations that still amaze us today
Sentence:
StevanZZ/Alamy Stock Photo

What: The heart of ancient Rome

Where: Rome, Italy

Whoa: A pancake stack of palaces

Rome might have been known as “the city of the seven hills,” but only one mound really mattered: The Palatine.

Article Title: The genius Roman creations that still amaze us today
Sentence: This prehistoric origin site became the must-have address of leading Republican politicians before Emperor Augustus took charge, back in 27 BCE, and started a streak of Imperial palace-building.

Article Title: The genius Roman creations that still amaze us today
Sentence: Tiberius, Domitian and Nero continued the pancake-stacking frenzy until the whole hill was completely buried under the masonry, monumental arches, pillars and towering retaining walls you see today.

Article Title: The genius Roman creations that still amaze us today
Sentence: The result is a fascinating puzzle for visitors to unravel while enjoying spectacular views of forum ruins at its feet and across to the Coliseum and Circus Maximus.

Article Title: The genius Roman creations that still amaze us today
Sentence: Don’t miss the house of Augustus guided tour either, as the projected displays are a masterpiece of museum tech.

Article Title: The genius Roman creations that still amaze us today
Sentence: Fun fact: Nero’s palace on the Palatine burnt down, so he swapped to another hill for his second “Golden Home.”

Article Title: The genius Roman creations that still amaze us today
Sentence:
Porta Nigra

What: Huge German frontier gate

Where: Trier, Germany

Whoa: Like “Game of Thrones” but for real

Throughout Roman history, Germany was the final frontier where only the boldest of emperors would go.

Article Title: The genius Roman creations that still amaze us today
Sentence: The remains of countless centuries of campaigning against tenacious Teutonic tribes are still relatively rare though.

Article Title: The genius Roman creations that still amaze us today
Sentence: This makes the Porta Nigra (Black Gate) in Trier particularly important.

Article Title: The genius Roman creations that still amaze us today
Sentence: While having four gates on each side of a square town was the standard Roman civic design all over the empire, Trier’s double-tower castle design is also outstanding in its size and complexity.

Article Title: The genius Roman creations that still amaze us today
Sentence: That’s made this dramatic structure a designated UNESCO World Heritage site and well worth a visit on any Roman road trip across Europe.

Article Title: The genius Roman creations that still amaze us today
Sentence: Fun fact: The archway stonework was never fully finished, which means the gates would never have shut properly.

Article Title: The genius Roman creations that still amaze us today
Sentence:
Vindolanda

Vindolanda is still being excavated by archaeologists.

Article Title: The genius Roman creations that still amaze us today
Sentence:
Highlight of Hadrian’s Wall

Where: Northern England

Whoa: Roman love letters and so many sandals

The roller coaster, 70-mile-long turf and stone wall that Hadrian built coast to coast across northern England is a multi-site, must-visit Roman treasure in itself.

Article Title: The genius Roman creations that still amaze us today
Sentence: Vindolanda, just to the south of the craggy, weatherbeaten ridgeline fortifications, is home to a unique and unmissable museum too.

Article Title: The genius Roman creations that still amaze us today
Sentence: The “Vindolanda tablets” are a collection of wooden “Post It” notes preserved in the waterlogged ground of the site.

Article Title: The genius Roman creations that still amaze us today
Sentence: Their handwritten texts include military admin documents, curses, love letters and even a party invitation from an officer’s wife.

Article Title: The genius Roman creations that still amaze us today
Sentence: Together they offer a unique insight into everyday life at the farthest-flung edge of the Roman Empire.

Article Title: The genius Roman creations that still amaze us today
Sentence: The onsite museum also has a huge collection of superbly preserved sandals, leatherwork, fabric and even wigs from nearly 2,000 years ago.

Article Title: The genius Roman creations that still amaze us today
Sentence: You can watch archaeologists working on the site every summer too, so who knows what they’ll find while you’re there.

Article Title: The genius Roman creations that still amaze us today
Sentence: Fun fact: Hadrian’s Wall isn’t the furthest north the Romans got.

Article Title: The genius Roman creations that still amaze us today
Sentence: Antonine built another wall further up in Scotland but didn’t like the cooking so didn’t bother staying.

Article Title: The genius Roman creations that still amaze us today
Sentence:
Aphrodisia

What: The ancient city of love

﻿Where: Anatolia, Turkey

﻿Whoa: Incredibly intact Roman city

Despite being named after the Greek goddess of love, it’s the Roman remains that you’re going to fall head over heels for at Aphrodisia.

Article Title: The genius Roman creations that still amaze us today
Sentence: A UNESCO World Heritage site since 2017, Aphrodisia was largely deserted after an earthquake, so it’s been untouched for over 1,500 years.

Article Title: The genius Roman creations that still amaze us today
Sentence: The incredibly well-preserved remains include the towering columns of the Temple of Aphrodisia itself and a semi-circular, marble-seated Odeon for political meetings.

Article Title: The genius Roman creations that still amaze us today
Sentence: A vast multi-story, pillared sebastion (imperial temple), theater auditorium and bath house also wait to be discovered among scattered sculptures and whispering trees.

Article Title: The genius Roman creations that still amaze us today
Sentence: Or maybe you’ll want to run a Roman lap around one of the best preserved – and largest – stadiums in the empire.

Article Title: The genius Roman creations that still amaze us today
Sentence: Fun fact: The Temple of Aphrodisia is actually the least well-loved bit of the site as Christian Emperors partially demolished it to deter die-hard Aphrodisiacs.

Article Title: The genius Roman creations that still amaze us today
Sentence:
Baths of Caracalla

The Baths of Caracalla were built from an estimated 5,000,000 tons of stone.

Article Title: The genius Roman creations that still amaze us today
Sentence:
leventina/iStockphoto/Getty Images

What: Ruins of a huge public bath complex

Where: Rome, Italy

Whoa: Rome’s forgotten jaw dropper

If there was one Roman site that needs the kind of ominous drone soundtrack normally reserved for the first appearance of a planet-destroying spaceship on a cinema screen, it’s the Baths of Caracalla.

Article Title: The genius Roman creations that still amaze us today
Sentence: This one good deed of the infamous, brother-murdering tyrant Caracalla is often forgotten, but we reckon this behemoth of a building is absolutely worth including on any Roman itinerary.

Article Title: The genius Roman creations that still amaze us today
Sentence: Built from an estimated 5,000,000 tons of stone, it is genuinely jaw dropping in scale.

Article Title: The genius Roman creations that still amaze us today
Sentence: The furnace-stoked underfloor heating and multiple baths fed by dedicated aqueducts entertained and steam-cleaned up to 8,000 Romans a day for three centuries.

Article Title: The genius Roman creations that still amaze us today
Sentence: And while ruined and isolated from the normal tourist trail now, that somehow makes this monstrous local leisure center even more resonant as a vast brooding reminder of the scale Rome operated on.

Article Title: The genius Roman creations that still amaze us today
Sentence: Fun fact: The baths of Caracalla aren’t even the biggest in Rome.

Article Title: The genius Roman creations that still amaze us today
Sentence: Diocletian gets that badge.

Article Title: The genius Roman creations that still amaze us today
