Article Title: Why America says Apple is a monopoly
Sentence:
New York CNN —

“Buy your mom an iPhone.”

Article Title: Why America says Apple is a monopoly
Sentence: That was Apple CEO Tim Cook’s famous response at Vox’s 2022 Code Conference, when a reporter complained that her mother couldn’t see the videos she texted to her mom’s Android phone because they were grainy and slow.

Article Title: Why America says Apple is a monopoly
Sentence: It’s also a quip that US Attorney General Merrick Garland quoted – and sharply criticized – Thursday at a press conference announcing the Justice Department’s landmark antitrust lawsuit against Apple, in which the Biden administration and 16 states allege Apple is illegally abusing the iPhone’s monopoly power in the smartphone market.

Article Title: Why America says Apple is a monopoly
Sentence: The massive lawsuit against one of the world’s largest companies claims Apple is breaking the law by carefully curating its app store and customer experience, designed to lure customers in and keep them buying Apple products and services – to the exclusion of competitors.

Article Title: Why America says Apple is a monopoly
Sentence: Apple, in a statement, said it disagreed with the lawsuit and would fight it vigorously.

Article Title: Why America says Apple is a monopoly
Sentence: “This lawsuit threatens who we are and the principles that set Apple products apart in fiercely competitive markets,” the company said.

Article Title: Why America says Apple is a monopoly
Sentence: If successful, the suit could force Apple to loosen some of the restrictions it has placed on its “walled garden” approach to hardware and software.

Article Title: Why America says Apple is a monopoly
Sentence: It could be made to open up its iPhone to alternative app stores and its technologies like iMessage with Android phones.

Article Title: Why America says Apple is a monopoly
Sentence: The Justice Department, in its complaint, highlighted five ways it says Apple is abusing its dominant position to the detriment of Americans.

Article Title: Why America says Apple is a monopoly
Sentence:
Green bubbles

With iMessage, Apple created an enhanced text messaging service that allows people to seamlessly communicate with one another, sending rich text, high-quality video and audio that uploads almost instantly – as long as it’s sent to another iPhone customer.

Article Title: Why America says Apple is a monopoly
Sentence: When those messages get sent to people with Android phones, they appear grainy, they can be slow to load , and they can miss out on key features like emoji responses, editing functionality and end-to-end encryption.

Article Title: Why America says Apple is a monopoly
Sentence: The dreaded “green bubbles” that mark Android users within iMessage – and particularly the lower-quality performance – are illegal, the Justice Department alleges.

Article Title: Why America says Apple is a monopoly
Sentence: “As any iPhone user who has ever seen a green text message, or received a tiny, grainy video can attest — Apple’s anticompetitive conduct also includes making it more difficult for iPhone users to message with users of non-Apple products,” Garland said on Thursday.

Article Title: Why America says Apple is a monopoly
Sentence: “As a result, iPhone users perceive rival smartphones as being lower quality because the experience of messaging friends and family who do not own iPhones is worse — even though Apple is the one responsible for breaking cross-platform messaging.

Article Title: Why America says Apple is a monopoly
Sentence: And it does so intentionally.”

Article Title: Why America says Apple is a monopoly
Sentence: Apple last year said it would adopt a new standard of technology for communication with Android phones that will open up some, but not all, of those features.

Article Title: Why America says Apple is a monopoly
Sentence: The green bubbles will remain.

Article Title: Why America says Apple is a monopoly
Sentence:
Apple Pay exclusivity

Apple helped revolutionize the way we pay for things, tying customers’ credit cards to technology inside iPhones to make payments more secure and seamless.

Article Title: Why America says Apple is a monopoly
Sentence: And Apple takes a tiny payment for each transaction.

Article Title: Why America says Apple is a monopoly
Sentence: But Apple Pay is the only way iPhone owners can pay for stuff using that technology on an iPhone.

Article Title: Why America says Apple is a monopoly
Sentence: Apple, citing security reasons, doesn’t allow third-party apps to access the chip that allows for iPhones to make mobile payments.

Article Title: Why America says Apple is a monopoly
Sentence: It also could entice some customers to stick with iPhones when they’d otherwise switch to a competitor, the lawsuit alleges.

Article Title: Why America says Apple is a monopoly
Sentence: “Apple also deprives users of the benefits and innovations third-party wallets would provide,” the Justice Department said in its complaint.

Article Title: Why America says Apple is a monopoly
Sentence: “Cross-platform digital wallets would offer an easier, more seamless, and potentially more secure way for users to switch from the iPhone to another smartphone.”

Article Title: Why America says Apple is a monopoly
Sentence:
Making rivals less useful than Apple Watch

Apple Watch, one of Apple’s most successful products, is not compatible with Android phones – on purpose, the Justice Department alleges.

Article Title: Why America says Apple is a monopoly
Sentence: Although some smartwatches work seamlessly with any kind of smartphone, Apple Watches, a market leader, require iPhones to operate.

Article Title: Why America says Apple is a monopoly
Sentence: That locks customers into Apple’s ecosystem of hardware and software, forcing Apple Watch customers to buy iPhones.

Article Title: Why America says Apple is a monopoly
Sentence: “Apple uses smartwatches, a costly accessory, to prevent iPhone customers from choosing other phones,” the Justice Department said in its complaint.

Article Title: Why America says Apple is a monopoly
Sentence: “Having copied the idea of a smartwatch from third-party developers, Apple now prevents those developers from innovating and limits the Apple Watch to the iPhone to prevent a negative ‘impact to iPhone sales.’”

Article Title: Why America says Apple is a monopoly
Sentence:
Banning third-party app stores

The only way to get apps on an iPhone is through Apple’s proprietary app store.

Article Title: Why America says Apple is a monopoly
Sentence: Apple has long claimed that its approach to maintaining what apps can and cannot be used on an iPhone helps customers.

Article Title: Why America says Apple is a monopoly
Sentence: It prevents spam and harmful apps, Apple says.

Article Title: Why America says Apple is a monopoly
Sentence: It forces apps into Apple’s onerous limitations and expensive 30% commissions, the Justice Department argues.

Article Title: Why America says Apple is a monopoly
Sentence: And it limits competition.

Article Title: Why America says Apple is a monopoly
Sentence: For example, the Justice Department cites cloud-based gaming app stores as a service that Apple illegally prevents from appearing on an iPhone.

Article Title: Why America says Apple is a monopoly
Sentence: Companies that want to stream games to customers have to load each individual game to the app store, which prevents companies from marketing and selling potentially powerful and popular competitive technology to customers.

Article Title: Why America says Apple is a monopoly
Sentence:
Restricting super apps

Apple forces app developers to write code specifically for its operating system, restricting developers from coding using universal languages that could offer a single app experience across any device.

Article Title: Why America says Apple is a monopoly
Sentence: That prevents apps from becoming “super apps” – apps that run identically on Apple’s iOS

Article Title: Why America says Apple is a monopoly
Sentence: iPhone operating system and Google’s Android OS.

Article Title: Why America says Apple is a monopoly
Sentence: Apple also restricts “mini programs” – apps within apps that effectively run on the web.

Article Title: Why America says Apple is a monopoly
Sentence: The Justice Department says that requirement locks developers into Apple’s system.

Article Title: Why America says Apple is a monopoly
Sentence: “Since at least 2017, Apple has arbitrarily imposed exclusionary requirements that unnecessarily and unjustifiably restrict mini programs and super apps,” the Justice Department said in its complaint.

Article Title: Why America says Apple is a monopoly
Sentence: “Apple exerted its control over app distribution to stifle others’ innovation.”

Article Title: Apple sued in a landmark iPhone monopoly lawsuit
Sentence:
Washington CNN —

The US Justice Department and more than a dozen states filed a blockbuster antitrust lawsuit against Apple on Thursday, accusing the giant company of illegally monopolizing the smartphone market.

Article Title: Apple sued in a landmark iPhone monopoly lawsuit
Sentence: It’s the largest in a recent string of Big Tech companies to face antitrust complaints from the US government, which is cracking down on the massive industry, whose power has gone largely unchecked over the past several decades.

Article Title: Apple sued in a landmark iPhone monopoly lawsuit
Sentence: The complaint, said Attorney General Merrick Garland at a news conference, alleges that ”Apple has maintained monopoly power in the smartphone market not simply by staying ahead of the competition on the merits but by violating federal antitrust law.”

Article Title: Apple sued in a landmark iPhone monopoly lawsuit
Sentence: “Consumers should not have to pay higher prices because companies break the law,” he added.

Article Title: Apple sued in a landmark iPhone monopoly lawsuit
Sentence: The long-anticipated lawsuit, which was filed in the US District Court for the District of New Jersey, comes after years of allegations by critics that Apple has harmed competition with restrictive app store terms, high fees and its “walled-garden” approach to its hardware and software:

Article Title: Apple sued in a landmark iPhone monopoly lawsuit
Sentence: Apple famously makes its tech easy to use, but it achieves that by tightly controlling – and in some cases, restricting – how third-party companies can interact with the tech behemoth’s products and services.

Article Title: Apple sued in a landmark iPhone monopoly lawsuit
Sentence: In some cases, Apple may give its own products better access and features than its competitors.

Article Title: Apple sued in a landmark iPhone monopoly lawsuit
Sentence: The company said it denied the lawsuit’s allegations and would fight them and added that the lawsuit could empower government “to take a heavy hand in designing people’s technology.”

Article Title: Apple sued in a landmark iPhone monopoly lawsuit
Sentence: But Garland on Thursday said Apple’s actions have wide-ranging effects.

Article Title: Apple sued in a landmark iPhone monopoly lawsuit
Sentence: “Monopolies like Apple’s threaten the free and fair markets upon which our economy is based.

Article Title: Apple sued in a landmark iPhone monopoly lawsuit
Sentence: They stifle innovation.

Article Title: Apple sued in a landmark iPhone monopoly lawsuit
Sentence: They hurt producers and workers and increase cost for consumers,” Garland said Thursday.

Article Title: Apple sued in a landmark iPhone monopoly lawsuit
Sentence: “If left unchallenged, Apple will only continue to strengthen its smartphone monopoly.

Article Title: Apple sued in a landmark iPhone monopoly lawsuit
Sentence: But there’s a law for that,” he added.

Article Title: Apple sued in a landmark iPhone monopoly lawsuit
Sentence: For example, Apple allows iPhone customers to send high-quality photos and videos seamlessly to one another, but multimedia texts to Android phones are slower and grainy.

Article Title: Apple sued in a landmark iPhone monopoly lawsuit
Sentence: The company late last year relented and agreed to improve the quality standard it uses to interact with Android phones via text message – but it still maintains those messages in green bubbles, creating a kind of class divide, critics argue.

Article Title: Apple sued in a landmark iPhone monopoly lawsuit
Sentence: The company also gives its own products the ability to access certain parts of its hardware that it restricts other companies from using.

Article Title: Apple sued in a landmark iPhone monopoly lawsuit
Sentence: That unleashes an almost magical experience for how iPhones interact with AirTags, when competitors’ products are far more limited in their capabilities.

Article Title: Apple sued in a landmark iPhone monopoly lawsuit
Sentence: “Apple creates barriers that make it extremely difficult and expensive for both users and developers to venture outside the Apple ecosystem,” Garland said on Thursday.

Article Title: Apple sued in a landmark iPhone monopoly lawsuit
Sentence:
‘We will vigorously defend against it’

This year, European regulations forced Apple to give other companies access to the iPhone’s tap-to-pay hardware chip, enabling the creation of competing digital wallets.

Article Title: Apple sued in a landmark iPhone monopoly lawsuit
Sentence: But those rules are limited to the European Union.

Article Title: Apple sued in a landmark iPhone monopoly lawsuit
Sentence: And Apple maintains a 30% commission on most sales through its app store – a frequent complaint from companies that try to sell subscriptions, saying Apple’s enormous share of the smartphone market forces them to pay what they argue is an unnecessarily high commission.

Article Title: Apple sued in a landmark iPhone monopoly lawsuit
Sentence: “We believe this lawsuit is wrong on the facts and the law, and we will vigorously defend against it,” Apple said in a statement.

Article Title: Apple sued in a landmark iPhone monopoly lawsuit
Sentence: Thursday’s suit claims Apple has illegally monopolized smartphone markets by using a complex web of contractual terms that harm everything from text messaging to mobile payments.

Article Title: Apple sued in a landmark iPhone monopoly lawsuit
Sentence: Among other things, the DOJ says, Apple has used its control over iOS, the iPhone operating system, to block innovative new apps and cloud streaming services from the public; degrade how Android messages appear on iPhones; restricted how competing smartwatches can work with iPhones; and hindered rival payment solutions.

Article Title: Apple sued in a landmark iPhone monopoly lawsuit
Sentence: Apple, in a statement, said the lawsuit would set a “dangerous precedent” and hinder its ability to make the compelling and consumer-friendly technology that have made the company one of the most valuable in the world.

Article Title: Apple sued in a landmark iPhone monopoly lawsuit
Sentence: “At Apple, we innovate every day to make technology people love – designing products that work seamlessly together, protect people’s privacy and security, and create a magical experience for our users,” the company said in its statement.

Article Title: Apple sued in a landmark iPhone monopoly lawsuit
Sentence: “This lawsuit threatens who we are and the principles that set Apple products apart in fiercely competitive markets.”

Article Title: Apple sued in a landmark iPhone monopoly lawsuit
Sentence:
The changes the DOJ wants from Apple

Thursday’s lawsuit against Apple seeks three specific remedies that could dramatically change the company’s business model.

Article Title: Apple sued in a landmark iPhone monopoly lawsuit
Sentence: The Justice Department wants a court order barring Apple from using its app store to block innovative new apps.

Article Title: Apple sued in a landmark iPhone monopoly lawsuit
Sentence: It also wants the court to block Apple-imposed restrictions that prevent other messaging apps, smartwatches, digital wallets and other technologies from integrating with the iPhone.

Article Title: Apple sued in a landmark iPhone monopoly lawsuit
Sentence: It also called for the court to prevent Apple from using its contractual terms to “obtain, maintain, extend, or entrench” the company’s alleged monopoly.

Article Title: Apple sued in a landmark iPhone monopoly lawsuit
Sentence: The complaint, a copy of which was reviewed by CNN, does not explicitly call for a breakup of Apple.

Article Title: Apple sued in a landmark iPhone monopoly lawsuit
Sentence: But it did not rule out the possibility, and asks for “relief as needed to cure any competitive harm.”

Article Title: Apple sued in a landmark iPhone monopoly lawsuit
Sentence: According to the complaint, the list of participating states or districts in the suit include New Jersey, Arizona, California, Connecticut, Maine, Michigan, Minnesota, New Hampshire, New York, North Dakota, Oklahoma, Oregon, Tennessee, Vermont, Wisconsin and the District of Columbia.

Article Title: Apple sued in a landmark iPhone monopoly lawsuit
Sentence:
Years of scrutiny

Apple has shrugged off legal challenges and criticism for years that its practices are anticompetitive.

Article Title: Apple sued in a landmark iPhone monopoly lawsuit
Sentence: Its sterling consumer reputation and a disciplined public relations and legal strategy mirror the precision with which Apple manufactures and oversees its products.

Article Title: Apple sued in a landmark iPhone monopoly lawsuit
Sentence: But the Justice Department’s landmark suit challenges a broad range of Apple’s practices.

Article Title: Apple sued in a landmark iPhone monopoly lawsuit
Sentence: The case represents the Biden administration’s latest effort to hold a Big Tech giant accountable under US antitrust law.

Article Title: Apple sued in a landmark iPhone monopoly lawsuit
Sentence: Apple was named in a sprawling House report in 2020 finding that the iPhone maker, along with Meta, Google and Amazon, hold “monopoly power.”

Article Title: Apple sued in a landmark iPhone monopoly lawsuit
Sentence: Until Thursday, Apple was the only one of those tech companies the federal government had not yet sued for alleged antitrust violations.

Article Title: Apple sued in a landmark iPhone monopoly lawsuit
Sentence: The legal action could weigh on Apple’s stock price, which currently values the company at just under $3 trillion, and could force changes to policies, business strategies, products and applications by the tech giant.

Article Title: Apple sued in a landmark iPhone monopoly lawsuit
Sentence: Even divestment of some assets is not out of the question for Apple, the tech company founded by Steve Jobs in the 1970s.

Article Title: Apple sued in a landmark iPhone monopoly lawsuit
Sentence: Apple’s (AAPL) stock fell 3% Thursday.

Article Title: Apple sued in a landmark iPhone monopoly lawsuit
Sentence: The lawsuit was widely anticipated.

Article Title: Apple sued in a landmark iPhone monopoly lawsuit
Sentence: Along with a pair of ongoing antitrust cases against Google, the DOJ lawsuit against Apple is likely to become a symbol of the Biden administration’s commitment to competition and lowering prices.

Article Title: Apple sued in a landmark iPhone monopoly lawsuit
Sentence: It will also be a test of how far courts are willing to go to apply decades-old antitrust law to the modern digital economy.

Article Title: Apple sued in a landmark iPhone monopoly lawsuit
Sentence: The Apple case may be one of the most closely watched lawsuits brought by Jonathan Kanter, Biden’s top DOJ antitrust official.

Article Title: Apple sued in a landmark iPhone monopoly lawsuit
Sentence: Kanter, who in private practice once represented rivals to Google including Microsoft and Yelp, is viewed as part of a fresh generation of regulators.

Article Title: Apple sued in a landmark iPhone monopoly lawsuit
Sentence: Along with his counterpart at the Federal Trade Commission, Lina Khan, Kanter has argued that the United States has for decades allowed a wave of corporate consolidation and anticompetitive practices that ultimately harmed the public through higher prices, fewer choices or reduced innovation.

Article Title: Apple sued in a landmark iPhone monopoly lawsuit
Sentence:
Apps vs Apple

To solve Android phone customers’ “green bubble” issue, Eric Migicovsky, a tech entrepreneur, says an app he created, dubbed Beeper Mini, to help Android users message iPhone users without those limitations was quickly shut down by Apple.

Article Title: Apple sued in a landmark iPhone monopoly lawsuit
Sentence: “It lasted for a total of three days before Apple started to take swings at us,” Migicovsky said.

Article Title: Apple sued in a landmark iPhone monopoly lawsuit
Sentence: “Technologically, they worked very hard to take actions to penalize Beeper Mini users by knocking the connection offline or by making it progressively more unreliable.”

Article Title: Apple sued in a landmark iPhone monopoly lawsuit
Sentence: Those kind of interactions have made Apple’s app store a focus of antitrust complaints.

Article Title: Apple sued in a landmark iPhone monopoly lawsuit
Sentence: Beginning in 2020, Apple fought a highly public court battle against Epic Games, maker of the video game “Fortnite.”

Article Title: Apple sued in a landmark iPhone monopoly lawsuit
Sentence: Apple isn’t an illegal monopolist in distributing iOS apps, federal courts have decided in that case, highlighting the difficulty of pinning Apple down on federal antitrust charges.

Article Title: Apple sued in a landmark iPhone monopoly lawsuit
Sentence: Apple did, however, get penalized for violating a California competition law and altered some of its app store practices in response to a court order.

Article Title: Apple sued in a landmark iPhone monopoly lawsuit
Sentence: Those rulings highlight the challenges ahead for the Justice Department, which will need to bring a strong legal theory about how Apple has allegedly harmed competition, legal experts say.

Article Title: Apple sued in a landmark iPhone monopoly lawsuit
Sentence: The DOJ would also need to prove that the benefits Apple has delivered to consumers don’t outweigh its alleged antitrust violations.

Article Title: Apple sued in a landmark iPhone monopoly lawsuit
Sentence:
Europe’s bite at Apple

The US government isn’t the only one to pressure Apple to change its business practices.

Article Title: Apple sued in a landmark iPhone monopoly lawsuit
Sentence: In March, a new European Union law took effect that forces Apple to make significant adjustments.

Article Title: Apple sued in a landmark iPhone monopoly lawsuit
Sentence: In a seismic move to comply with the EU’s Digital Markets Act (DMA), Apple said for the first time it would allow users in the trading bloc to download apps from third-party app stores.

Article Title: Apple sued in a landmark iPhone monopoly lawsuit
Sentence: But critics including Epic are already accusing Apple of violating the EU law.

Article Title: Apple sued in a landmark iPhone monopoly lawsuit
Sentence: Just before the DMA took effect, Epic complained to competition authorities that Apple blocked it from launching its own app store on iOS.

Article Title: Apple sued in a landmark iPhone monopoly lawsuit
Sentence: The European Commission is investigating.

Article Title: Apple sued in a landmark iPhone monopoly lawsuit
Sentence:
Upstart turned behemoth

Since its early days, Apple has pursued a reputation as an elite, high-design brand.

Article Title: Apple sued in a landmark iPhone monopoly lawsuit
Sentence: It’s often focused on a premium user experience and design aesthetic, setting its products apart from rivals such as Microsoft and Google.

Article Title: Apple sued in a landmark iPhone monopoly lawsuit
Sentence: That limited approach worked for years, until a wave of complaints by app developers and consumers drew more attention to the potential downsides of Apple’s restrictiveness.

Article Title: Apple sued in a landmark iPhone monopoly lawsuit
Sentence: In the era led by founder Steve Jobs, “Apple was a cultural phenomenon that pitted wingtips against sandals; suits against t-shirts,” said James Bailey, a professor of leadership development at the George Washington University School of Business.

Article Title: Apple sued in a landmark iPhone monopoly lawsuit
Sentence: “Apple relentlessly innovated.

Article Title: Apple sued in a landmark iPhone monopoly lawsuit
Sentence: They were always steps ahead of the competition.”

Article Title: Apple sued in a landmark iPhone monopoly lawsuit
Sentence: Now, however, Apple’s advances are more “incremental” than earth-shattering, Bailey added.

Article Title: Apple sued in a landmark iPhone monopoly lawsuit
Sentence: “[CEO Tim] Cook has been focused on financial management and expanding market share.”

Article Title: Apple sued in a landmark iPhone monopoly lawsuit
Sentence: “Apple’s financially healthy,” Bailey said, but their reputation for innovation is “dimming.”

Article Title: Apple’s Tim Cook goes on China charm offensive to revive flagging iPhone sales
Sentence:
Hong Kong/Beijing CNN —

Tim Cook is making a high-profile visit to China that coincides with Apple opening a huge new store in Shanghai — its second biggest in the world.

Sentence: It’s all part of a push by the company to reverse a decline in iPhone sales in its most important international market.

Article Title: Apple’s Tim Cook goes on China charm offensive to revive flagging iPhone sales
Sentence: The new $11.6 million outlet — located in Shanghai’s central district of Jing’an, which is named after a historic temple — is the biggest in China and the second only to Apple’s flagship store on New York’s Fifth Avenue, Chinese state media reported.

Sentence:
CNN —

In a country best known for its soaring skyscrapers, modern architecture and sprawling desert, wildlife isn’t always what comes to mind when people think of the United Arab Emirates (UAE).

Article Title: Dubai photographer reveals the UAE’s hidden wildlife
Sentence: But Dubai-based photographer Anish Karingattil is determined to change that.

Article Title: Dubai photographer reveals the UAE’s hidden wildlife
Sentence: Originally from India, Karingattil moved to Dubai 17 years ago and began photographing wildlife shortly after, specializing in macro photography, using extreme close ups.

Article Title: Dubai photographer reveals the UAE’s hidden wildlife
Sentence: Highlights of his stunning portfolio of images, taken across the seven Emirates, include a scorpion with her babies, an Arabian horned viper hiding in the desert sand, and two black and yellow mud daubers covered in dew drops.

Article Title: Dubai photographer reveals the UAE’s hidden wildlife
Sentence: “Photographers get to tell a story through images,” Karingattil says.

Article Title: Dubai photographer reveals the UAE’s hidden wildlife
Sentence: “Macro photography allows me to see life and the world around me in a brand-new way.”

Article Title: Dubai photographer reveals the UAE’s hidden wildlife
Sentence: Despite its hot climate and harsh desert, the UAE is home to over 1,000 plant and animal species.

Article Title: Dubai photographer reveals the UAE’s hidden wildlife
Sentence: The waters around the country are home to the largest concentration of Indian Ocean humpbacks dolphin in the world, and the second-largest population of dugongs, after Australia.

Article Title: Dubai photographer reveals the UAE’s hidden wildlife
Sentence: With the UAE’s president recently extending the country’s “Year of Sustainability” into 2024, Karingattil uses wildlife photography as a method of capturing the country’s biodiversity and sharing it with others.

Article Title: Dubai photographer reveals the UAE’s hidden wildlife
Sentence: While interior design is his full-time job, “herping” is his passion.

Article Title: Dubai photographer reveals the UAE’s hidden wildlife
Sentence: “Herping is the act of observing, studying, and photographing reptiles and amphibians in their natural habitats,” says Karingattil.

Article Title: Dubai photographer reveals the UAE’s hidden wildlife
Sentence: “It is a popular hobby among nature enthusiasts and wildlife photographers who are fascinated by the diversity and beauty of these creatures.”

Article Title: Dubai photographer reveals the UAE’s hidden wildlife
Sentence: Some snakes found in the UAE, including this saw-scaled viper, are aggressive and highly venomous.

Article Title: Dubai photographer reveals the UAE’s hidden wildlife
Sentence: But photographing potentially dangerous animals like snakes and spiders takes a lot of preparation.

Article Title: Dubai photographer reveals the UAE’s hidden wildlife
Sentence: Before attempting to photograph any wildlife, Karingattil says it is important to research its behavior, habitat and potential risks to understand how to approach it safely and minimize the risk of harm to both the photographer and the animal.

Article Title: Dubai photographer reveals the UAE’s hidden wildlife
Sentence: For Karingattil, conservation is an important aspect of wildlife photography, which he believes can serve as a powerful tool for advocacy.

Article Title: Dubai photographer reveals the UAE’s hidden wildlife
Sentence: “By documenting the beauty and fragility of the natural world, photographers can help policymakers and the general public understand the value of protecting the environment and the need for sustainable practices,” he says.

Article Title: Dubai photographer reveals the UAE’s hidden wildlife
Sentence: And with over 69,000 followers on Instagram, Karingattil uses social media to educate people about the species he photographs.

Article Title: Dubai photographer reveals the UAE’s hidden wildlife
Sentence:
Biodiversity in the UAE

The UAE has 49 terrestrial and marine protected areas, including eight in Dubai.

Article Title: Dubai photographer reveals the UAE’s hidden wildlife
Sentence: Accounting for over 18% of the country’s land territory and 12% of its marine and coastal territory, these protected areas are often natural reserves which include all the major ecosystems found in the region: mountain, desert, coastal and marine.

Article Title: Dubai photographer reveals the UAE’s hidden wildlife
Sentence: Andrew Gardner, associate director of Biodiversity Conservation at Emirates Nature-WWF, says wildlife conservation is recognized as an “important responsibility and obligation by the UAE.”

Article Title: Dubai photographer reveals the UAE’s hidden wildlife
Sentence: For example, the country is a signatory to multiple international conservation conventions, such as the Convention on Biological Diversity, and has helped reintroduce animals such as the Arabian oryx to the Arabian Peninsula.

Article Title: Dubai photographer reveals the UAE’s hidden wildlife
Sentence: According to Gardner, there are now over 1,600 oryx in two of the UAE’s protected areas, and thousands more in zoos across the region.

Article Title: Dubai photographer reveals the UAE’s hidden wildlife
Sentence: However, rapid development and population growth across the Emirates mean that “53% of bird species, 46.7% of mammal species, 19% of reptile species, and 8% of plant species” are endangered, according to a government report.

Article Title: Dubai photographer reveals the UAE’s hidden wildlife
Sentence: It was Karingattil's long-term desire to photograph a scorpion, so when he came across this scorpion with her babies, he couldn't let the chance pass by.

Article Title: Dubai photographer reveals the UAE’s hidden wildlife
Sentence:
Anish Karingattil

Gardner says the Arabian wolf and striped hyena have both gone extinct from the UAE in recent decades, and a small population of Arabian leopards that lived the Hajar Mountains until the mid-1990s are now also believed to be extinct.

Article Title: Dubai photographer reveals the UAE’s hidden wildlife
Sentence: Karingattil points to habitat loss, climate change and overfishing as some of the major threats facing wildlife in the UAE, but one issue he thinks people should take more action against is plastic pollution.

Article Title: Dubai photographer reveals the UAE’s hidden wildlife
Sentence: “Whenever I explore the desert or other areas, I make it a point to clean up the surroundings,” he says.

Article Title: Dubai photographer reveals the UAE’s hidden wildlife
Sentence: “By removing litter and debris, we can reduce the impact of human activities on the natural world.”

Article Title: Aeternitas Tower: Dubai is building the world’s tallest residential clock tower
Sentence: Editor’s Note: This CNN series is, or was, sponsored by the country it highlights.

Article Title: Aeternitas Tower: Dubai is building the world’s tallest residential clock tower
Sentence: CNN retains full editorial control over subject matter, reporting and frequency of the articles and videos within the sponsorship, in compliance with our policy.

Article Title: Aeternitas Tower: Dubai is building the world’s tallest residential clock tower
Sentence:
CNN —

Dubai is set to add another towering figure to its skyline.

Article Title: Aeternitas Tower: Dubai is building the world’s tallest residential clock tower
Sentence: The Aeternitas Tower, officially unveiled at a launch event last week, will be the world’s tallest residential clock tower at a staggering 450 meters (1,476 feet) tall — more than four times the height of London’s Big Ben, and just 22 meters (72 feet) short of the world’s tallest residential building, the Central Park Tower in New York City.

Article Title: Aeternitas Tower: Dubai is building the world’s tallest residential clock tower
Sentence: Set to become the world’s second-tallest clock tower (after the Makkah Clock Royal Tower in Mecca, Saudi Arabia), Aeternitas Tower is the result of a partnership between Dubai-based real estate developer London Gate and Swiss luxury watch manufacturer Franck Muller.

Article Title: Aeternitas Tower: Dubai is building the world’s tallest residential clock tower
Sentence: London Gate purchased the plot of land in Dubai Marina, which already had the beginnings of an unfinished 106-story structure — and knew that the tower’s monumental size needed a striking facade, said Tom Hill, media relations coordinator for the developer.

Article Title: Aeternitas Tower: Dubai is building the world’s tallest residential clock tower
Sentence: “We believe the clock will be seen from six kilometers away because of the sheer height of the building,” said Hill, adding that the clock face will be an enormous 40 meters (131 feet) tall and 30 meters (98 feet) wide.

Article Title: Aeternitas Tower: Dubai is building the world’s tallest residential clock tower
Sentence: “We wanted to do something different that hasn’t been done before in Dubai,” said Hill.

Article Title: Aeternitas Tower: Dubai is building the world’s tallest residential clock tower
Sentence:
At 450 meters (1,476 feet) tall, the residences will tower over the neighboring skyscrapers in Dubai Marina and will replace Marina 101 as the city's second-tallest building London Gate

A timeless tower

Article Title: Aeternitas Tower: Dubai is building the world’s tallest residential clock tower
Sentence: The residential tower comprises 649 units, with a mix of one- to three-bedroom apartments, in addition to villa and mansion duplexes.

Article Title: Aeternitas Tower: Dubai is building the world’s tallest residential clock tower
Sentence: With housekeeping, a concierge service, and a 24-hour valet and porter, residents will have access to hotel-like services and facilities, but with the privacy and comfort of home.

Article Title: Aeternitas Tower: Dubai is building the world’s tallest residential clock tower
Sentence: Its shared amenities range from health facilities, including a gym, padel court, spa, yoga studio, and swimming pool, to arts and culture spaces such as a cinema, music room, and library.

Article Title: Aeternitas Tower: Dubai is building the world’s tallest residential clock tower
Sentence: The project will be handed over to residents in 2027, according to London Gate.

Article Title: Aeternitas Tower: Dubai is building the world’s tallest residential clock tower
Sentence: The tower’s name means “eternity” in Latin, and is inspired by the Franck Muller Aeternitas watch collection — one of the brand’s most complex designs which features an “eternal calendar,” said Erol Baliyan, managing director of Franck Muller in the Middle East and Africa.

Article Title: Aeternitas Tower: Dubai is building the world’s tallest residential clock tower
Sentence: The Aeternitas Tower will have amenities for residents such as gym, yoga studio, cinema, and swimming pool, pictured in this digital rendering.

Article Title: Aeternitas Tower: Dubai is building the world’s tallest residential clock tower
Sentence:
London Gate

The Swiss watchmaker sees its step into real estate as a move that will help create a monument that “mirrors the brand’s innovation, craftsmanship, and timeless elegance,” said Baliyan.

Article Title: Aeternitas Tower: Dubai is building the world’s tallest residential clock tower
Sentence: Aside from the striking clock face (inspired by Franck Muller’s art deco-style Long Island Collection, which has irregular squashed and stretched numbers in a rectangular case), the watchmaker will infuse its design ethos throughout the residence, said Baliyan.

Article Title: Aeternitas Tower: Dubai is building the world’s tallest residential clock tower
Sentence: He highlights luxury materials like brushed and polished metals, that will be contrasted with marble surfaces, textured fabrics and bold colors.

Article Title: Aeternitas Tower: Dubai is building the world’s tallest residential clock tower
Sentence: Meanwhile, in the lobby and reception, the signature oblong face of the brand’s Curvex watch is represented with curved walls, archways, and oval furnishings.

Article Title: Aeternitas Tower: Dubai is building the world’s tallest residential clock tower
Sentence: “Attention to detail is paramount, with meticulously crafted joinery and carefully arranged lighting and furniture, ensuring a refined ambiance,” said Baliyan.

Article Title: Aeternitas Tower: Dubai is building the world’s tallest residential clock tower
Sentence: A digital rendering shows the living space of one of the tower's luxury duplexes.

Article Title: Aeternitas Tower: Dubai is building the world’s tallest residential clock tower
Sentence:
London Gate

A booming market

The Aeternitas Tower is part of a growing trend in Dubai.

Article Title: Aeternitas Tower: Dubai is building the world’s tallest residential clock tower
Sentence: Luxury property is booming in the Emirate, and branded residences — collaborations between designer brands and property developers — are surging in popularity.

Article Title: Aeternitas Tower: Dubai is building the world’s tallest residential clock tower
Sentence: As of October 2023, there were 51 completed projects in the city, a figure that is expected to double by 2030, according to Savills Research, with brands like fashion house Karl Lagerfeld, car manufacturer Mercedes-Benz, and hoteliers 25Hours all announcing residential projects in the past year.

Article Title: Aeternitas Tower: Dubai is building the world’s tallest residential clock tower
Sentence: London Gate began phase one of its sales last week, with one-bedroom apartments starting at AED 1.6 million ($435,600).

Article Title: Aeternitas Tower: Dubai is building the world’s tallest residential clock tower
Sentence: “We’ve had an unbelievable level of interest since the launch,” said Hill, adding that in the first two days, London Gate sold around 30% of the initial 30-floor release, including all the available one-bedroom apartments.

Article Title: Aeternitas Tower: Dubai is building the world’s tallest residential clock tower
Sentence: The design for Aeternitas Tower was officially unveiled at a launch event on January 9 2024, at the Ritz-Carlton Dubai (pictured).

Article Title: Aeternitas Tower: Dubai is building the world’s tallest residential clock tower
Sentence:
London Gate

Hill believes that one factor driving interest is the tower’s location in Dubai Marina, where there’s a scarcity of sites for development, adding that an “iconic tower” like the Aeternitas is the first project of its kind to break ground in the district past few years.

Article Title: Aeternitas Tower: Dubai is building the world’s tallest residential clock tower
Sentence: While this is London Gate’s first branded residence project, it won’t be its last, said Hill, adding that the company will announce its next branded partnership by the end of Q1 this year.

Article Title: Aeternitas Tower: Dubai is building the world’s tallest residential clock tower
Sentence: As a rapidly evolving market, property in Dubai is often sold off-plan, with buyers waiting years to see their purchase.

Article Title: Aeternitas Tower: Dubai is building the world’s tallest residential clock tower
Sentence: This is where branded residences provide an extra layer of security, particularly for overseas buyers, said Hill.

Article Title: Aeternitas Tower: Dubai is building the world’s tallest residential clock tower
Sentence: “When you have a brand as world-renowned as Franck Muller, for example […] you have that peace of mind that you’re going to be handed over a world-class product,” he added.

Article Title: Tosin Oshinowo on building a sustainable house in one of the world’s most exclusive neighborhoods
Sentence: Architect Tosin Oshinowo is no stranger to versatility.

Article Title: Tosin Oshinowo on building a sustainable house in one of the world’s most exclusive neighborhoods
Sentence: She has designed one of the largest malls in Lagos, Nigeria, beach houses on the city’s coast and homes for internally displaced people in the north of the country.

Article Title: Tosin Oshinowo on building a sustainable house in one of the world’s most exclusive neighborhoods
Sentence: She also runs a bespoke furniture design company, and the Nigerian is the first African woman to curate the Sharjah Architecture Triennial, happening in the United Arab Emirates from November 2023 to March 2024.

Article Title: Tosin Oshinowo on building a sustainable house in one of the world’s most exclusive neighborhoods
Sentence: In late 2022, she and her design practice, cmDesign Atelier (cmDA), also completed their first residential project in the ultra-exclusive Banana Island neighborhood in Lagos: “The Lantern House.”

Article Title: Tosin Oshinowo on building a sustainable house in one of the world’s most exclusive neighborhoods
Sentence:
Oshinowo says the Lantern House project, a five-bedroom, seven-bathroom, three-story sustainable home, powered entirely by solar energy, was both exciting and a “slow labor of love.”

Contacted by her clients in September 2020, she, alongside her team and specialist contractors for various aspects of the home, started construction in January 2021 and ended last October.

Article Title: Tosin Oshinowo on building a sustainable house in one of the world’s most exclusive neighborhoods
Sentence:
Working on Banana Island

The 1.6 million-square meter (17 million-square feet), man-made Banana Island is named for its shape, and is a private, gated community in Nigeria’s commercial capital.

Article Title: Tosin Oshinowo on building a sustainable house in one of the world’s most exclusive neighborhoods
Sentence: (The exclusive area also made news in April, when a seven-story building under construction collapsed – adding to the list of building collapses in the greater Lagos State.)

Article Title: Tosin Oshinowo on building a sustainable house in one of the world’s most exclusive neighborhoods
Sentence: With private power and water infrastructure systems, property on the island is some of the most expensive on the continent.

Article Title: Tosin Oshinowo on building a sustainable house in one of the world’s most exclusive neighborhoods
Sentence: That exclusivity was one of the main challenges for the Lantern House project, says Oshinowo, with strictly enforced restricted working hours that made looming deadlines difficult to meet.

Article Title: Tosin Oshinowo on building a sustainable house in one of the world’s most exclusive neighborhoods
Sentence: Designed by Nigerian architect Tosin Oshinowo, the "Lantern House" is a private residence in the elite Banana Island community in Lagos, Nigeria.

Article Title: Tosin Oshinowo on building a sustainable house in one of the world’s most exclusive neighborhoods
Sentence:
Tolulope Sanusi/Rubyspolaroid Photography/cmDesign Atelier

Despite this, Oshinowo says seeing her vision come to life was fulfilling, adding that she’s proud of the end result.

Article Title: Tosin Oshinowo on building a sustainable house in one of the world’s most exclusive neighborhoods
Sentence: “It’s one thing to produce great conceptual design.

Article Title: Tosin Oshinowo on building a sustainable house in one of the world’s most exclusive neighborhoods
Sentence: It’s another thing to execute it to a seamless finish,” she said.

Article Title: Tosin Oshinowo on building a sustainable house in one of the world’s most exclusive neighborhoods
Sentence: “It’s such an exciting feeling to think that the decisions that you’ve made have worked.”

Article Title: Tosin Oshinowo on building a sustainable house in one of the world’s most exclusive neighborhoods
Sentence: She says something the Lantern House project emphasized for her is that “being meticulous in the long run always pays off.”

Article Title: Tosin Oshinowo on building a sustainable house in one of the world’s most exclusive neighborhoods
Sentence: cmDA has since started working on another project on Banana Island.

Article Title: Tosin Oshinowo on building a sustainable house in one of the world’s most exclusive neighborhoods
Sentence:
A childhood dream

Oshinowo remembers wanting to be an architect from the age of 12, looking over floor plans and helping her father to design part of their holiday home when she was young.

Article Title: Tosin Oshinowo on building a sustainable house in one of the world’s most exclusive neighborhoods
Sentence: With degrees in architecture and urban design from the UK as well as an MBA in architecture, she worked for architecture firms in the UK and Europe before moving back to Nigeria in 2009.

Article Title: Tosin Oshinowo on building a sustainable house in one of the world’s most exclusive neighborhoods
Sentence: The Lantern House features five bedrooms and seven bathrooms, and large wardrobes such as this one.

Article Title: Tosin Oshinowo on building a sustainable house in one of the world’s most exclusive neighborhoods
Sentence:
Tolulope Sanusi/Rubyspolaroid Photography/cmDesign Atelier

The award-winning architect says she founded cmDA in 2012 out of a need to create a strong aesthetic language; one that also projected a contemporary and progressive cultural identity of Africa.

Article Title: Tosin Oshinowo on building a sustainable house in one of the world’s most exclusive neighborhoods
Sentence: “(It’s) very important to create architecture that, as much as possible, can be delivered from what is available in country,” Oshinowo added.

Article Title: Tosin Oshinowo on building a sustainable house in one of the world’s most exclusive neighborhoods
Sentence: “And also in doing that, starting to think about issues to do with sustainability and responsibility towards the environment.”

Article Title: Tosin Oshinowo on building a sustainable house in one of the world’s most exclusive neighborhoods
Sentence: This bent towards sustainability is something the 43-year-old has carried into her curatorial role for this year’s upcoming Sharjah Architecture Triennial.

Article Title: Tosin Oshinowo on building a sustainable house in one of the world’s most exclusive neighborhoods
Sentence: The theme Oshinowo came up with is “The beauty of impermanence and the architecture of adaptability” which, she says, looks at under-celebrated innovations in the global south that deal with conditions of scarcity.

Article Title: Tosin Oshinowo on building a sustainable house in one of the world’s most exclusive neighborhoods
Sentence: She adds that she hopes the triennial will be an engaging space for the international community.

Article Title: Tosin Oshinowo on building a sustainable house in one of the world’s most exclusive neighborhoods
Sentence: “It’s a validation to know that coming from Nigeria, practicing as a Black female architect in West Africa, that my work is not just relevant to the context of where we find ourselves now,” Oshinowo said, “in terms of importance relating to sustainability (and) adaptability, but also to equity.”

Article Title: The Link, Dubai: The UAE’s longest suspended infinity pool just opened on the world’s longest cantilever building
Sentence:
CNN —

Dubai is making a splash with its most recent record-setting structure.

Article Title: The Link, Dubai: The UAE’s longest suspended infinity pool just opened on the world’s longest cantilever building
Sentence: The newly opened twin skyscrapers One Za’abeel are home to the world’s longest cantilever building and on it, the United Arab Emirates’ longest suspended infinity pool, which is 120 meters (393 feet) in length.

Article Title: The Link, Dubai: The UAE’s longest suspended infinity pool just opened on the world’s longest cantilever building
Sentence: A cantilever is a structure that is only connected at one end, and projects horizontally unsupported, like a diving board.

Article Title: The Link, Dubai: The UAE’s longest suspended infinity pool just opened on the world’s longest cantilever building
Sentence: The one at One Za’abeel is part of a 230-meter-long (755-foot) structure known as “The Link,” with the cantilever projecting 67.5 meters (221 feet) over the city.

Article Title: The Link, Dubai: The UAE’s longest suspended infinity pool just opened on the world’s longest cantilever building
Sentence: The Link connects the luxury development’s two towers, providing a space for shared facilities and lifestyle amenities, says Fadi Jabri, CEO of Nikken Sekkei Dubai, the architecture firm behind the building.

Article Title: The Link, Dubai: The UAE’s longest suspended infinity pool just opened on the world’s longest cantilever building
Sentence: “Levitating in the air,” the giant glass corridor is an engineering marvel — but it’s not just for show, says Jabri.

Article Title: The Link, Dubai: The UAE’s longest suspended infinity pool just opened on the world’s longest cantilever building
Sentence: The site is bisected by a six-lane highway, which meant building facilities at ground level was not possible, and “there was this need to rejoin those sites,” he explains.

Article Title: The Link, Dubai: The UAE’s longest suspended infinity pool just opened on the world’s longest cantilever building
Sentence: The property’s developers negotiated the use of the space below and above the road, allowing them to connect the two towers with a shopping mall beneath the road, and the Link above.

Article Title: The Link, Dubai: The UAE’s longest suspended infinity pool just opened on the world’s longest cantilever building
Sentence: The 120-meter-long (394-feet) pool at The Link is the UAE's longest suspended infinity pool.

Article Title: The Link, Dubai: The UAE’s longest suspended infinity pool just opened on the world’s longest cantilever building
Sentence:
International © Hufton + Crow

Twenty-five meters (82 feet) high and wide, the cantilever contains three stories and is a key destination for the building’s hotel guests and residents, says Badr Benryane, director of food and beverage at the One&Only Za’abeel resort, which occupies the top 30 floors of one of the towers.

Article Title: The Link, Dubai: The UAE’s longest suspended infinity pool just opened on the world’s longest cantilever building
Sentence: “In the absence of a beach and other water-based activities, our guests will have The Link as their playground,” says Benryane.

Article Title: The Link, Dubai: The UAE’s longest suspended infinity pool just opened on the world’s longest cantilever building
Sentence: “It’s been inspired by the bustling streets of big cities around the world: it’s a futuristic boulevard, so as you walk down the middle of The Link, you will have different dining experiences.”

Article Title: The Link, Dubai: The UAE’s longest suspended infinity pool just opened on the world’s longest cantilever building
Sentence: The Link’s eight restaurants include Tapasake, a poolside Nikkei restaurant serving up Japanese-Peruvian dishes.

Article Title: The Link, Dubai: The UAE’s longest suspended infinity pool just opened on the world’s longest cantilever building
Sentence: “On one end, there’s the restaurant with a terrace and indoor seating, and on the other is the pool club where we have amazing VIP cabanas, loungers and daybeds,” says Benryane.

Article Title: The Link, Dubai: The UAE’s longest suspended infinity pool just opened on the world’s longest cantilever building
Sentence: The pool is 100 meters off the ground — with nothing but a six-lane highway below.

Article Title: The Link, Dubai: The UAE’s longest suspended infinity pool just opened on the world’s longest cantilever building

International © Hufton + Crow

Having taken a dip in the pool himself

Article Title: The Link, Dubai: The UAE’s longest suspended infinity pool just opened on the world’s longest cantilever building
Sentence: , Benryane says it’s one of the highlights of the space.

Article Title: The Link, Dubai: The UAE’s longest suspended infinity pool just opened on the world’s longest cantilever building
Sentence: “You’re basically in that infinity pool with nothing below you,” he says, adding: “You’re swimming amongst the clouds and overlooking the city — it’s beautiful.”

Article Title: The Link, Dubai: The UAE’s longest suspended infinity pool just opened on the world’s longest cantilever building
Sentence: Temperature regulated and featuring underwater speakers, the unique bathing spot is open to hotel guests and One Za’abeel residents, although tourists and Dubai residents can gain access with a pool day pass, starting from 1,000 dirhams ($272) per person, and going up to $10,000 for VIP cabanas that come equipped with their own sound system, air conditioning, showers, dining rooms and private garden.

Article Title: The Link, Dubai: The UAE’s longest suspended infinity pool just opened on the world’s longest cantilever building
Sentence: Dubai is home to several record-setting pools: in 2021, the Aura Skypool became the world’s highest 360-degree infinity pool, and the world’s tallest infinity pool inside a building is the 293.9-meter-high (964.2 feet) pool on the 77th floor of the Address Beach Resort in Dubai’s Jumeirah Gate.

The Link’s 100-meter (328 feet) elevation and floor-to-ceiling windows provide 360-degree views across the city to the desert beyond, from which the building gets its name (“Za’abeel means the white sands of the region,” explains Badr).

Article Title: The Link, Dubai: The UAE’s longest suspended infinity pool just opened on the world’s longest cantilever building
Sentence: The cantilever isn’t just important for the building’s social space, but also its design: the two towers were built leaning slightly out, so the weight of The Link would pull them both in, strengthening the overall structure, says Jabri.

Article Title: The Link, Dubai: The UAE’s longest suspended infinity pool just opened on the world’s longest cantilever building

Article Title: Michael Jordan’s ultra-private, ultra-exclusive personal golf course: The Grove XXIII
Sentence:
CNN —

There’s one small corner of the world that Michael Jordan cherishes more than any other — his own personal haven of sporting bliss.

Article Title: Michael Jordan’s ultra-private, ultra-exclusive personal golf course: The Grove XXIII
Sentence: But it’s not in Chicago.

Article Title: Michael Jordan’s ultra-private, ultra-exclusive personal golf course: The Grove XXIII
Sentence: In fact, there isn’t a basketball court or hoop in sight.

Article Title: Michael Jordan’s ultra-private, ultra-exclusive personal golf course: The Grove XXIII
Sentence: Even as he was staking his claim in the 1990s as the greatest player the NBA has ever seen, the Bulls icon was a regular guest on the golf course.

Article Title: Michael Jordan’s ultra-private, ultra-exclusive personal golf course: The Grove XXIII
Sentence: These days, though, he hosts.

Article Title: Michael Jordan’s ultra-private, ultra-exclusive personal golf course: The Grove XXIII
Sentence: The Grove XXIII – a nod to his signature No. 23 jersey — is Jordan’s very own golf paradise, a private club tucked away on the outskirts of Hobe Sound, Florida.

Article Title: Michael Jordan’s ultra-private, ultra-exclusive personal golf course: The Grove XXIII
Sentence: Ultra-exclusive, few have seen it, and even fewer have played it.

Article Title: Michael Jordan’s ultra-private, ultra-exclusive personal golf course: The Grove XXIII
Sentence: The main clubhouse entrance to The Grove XXIII.

Article Title: Michael Jordan’s ultra-private, ultra-exclusive personal golf course: The Grove XXIII

Design by Nichols Architects / Photo by Mike Butler

For Bobby Weed, it was at once the most straightforward and most difficult brief he had ever received: “Build me the best golf course.

Article Title: Michael Jordan’s ultra-private, ultra-exclusive personal golf course: The Grove XXIII
Sentence: Build me the best driving range.”

Article Title: Michael Jordan’s ultra-private, ultra-exclusive personal golf course: The Grove XXIII
Sentence: And there had been plenty of briefs before.

Article Title: Michael Jordan’s ultra-private, ultra-exclusive personal golf course: The Grove XXIII
Sentence: A protégé, then close friend, of legendary course designer Pete Dye, the South Carolinian served as the PGA Tour’s chief architect before launching his own course design company in 1994.

Article Title: Michael Jordan’s ultra-private, ultra-exclusive personal golf course: The Grove XXIII
Sentence: Almost three decades on, Bobby Weed Golf Design has sculpted more than 20 courses from the ground up – from Stillwater, Minnesota, to Mito, Japan — and renovated many more, including Hobe Sound’s Medalist Golf Club in 2015.

Article Title: Michael Jordan’s ultra-private, ultra-exclusive personal golf course: The Grove XXIII
Sentence: With Tiger Woods headlining a member’s list that reads like a who’s who of the game’s elite, the Medalist is a private club that attracts a star-studded cohort of visitors.

Article Title: Michael Jordan’s ultra-private, ultra-exclusive personal golf course: The Grove XXIII
Sentence: Among them was Jordan, a keen admirer of the revamp and who, in late 2017, was on the hunt for a course architect.

Article Title: Michael Jordan’s ultra-private, ultra-exclusive personal golf course: The Grove XXIII
Sentence: The Medalist is a popular site for PGA Tour players.

Article Title: Michael Jordan’s ultra-private, ultra-exclusive personal golf course: The Grove XXIII
Sentence:
Cliff Hawkins / Getty Images

A meeting later, Weed’s team was signed on to construct a golf kingdom fit for “His Airness.”

Article Title: Michael Jordan’s ultra-private, ultra-exclusive personal golf course: The Grove XXIII
Sentence: As one of history’s most famous athletes, and with a net worth edging towards the $2 billion mark, according to Forbes, Jordan was a special category of client.

Article Title: Michael Jordan’s ultra-private, ultra-exclusive personal golf course: The Grove XXIII
Sentence: “I knew that it would get a lot of attention because of MJ,” Weed, 68, told CNN.

Article Title: Michael Jordan’s ultra-private, ultra-exclusive personal golf course: The Grove XXIII
Sentence: “I knew that there was some fanfare associated with it and I didn’t want to let him down.”

Article Title: Michael Jordan’s ultra-private, ultra-exclusive personal golf course: The Grove XXIII
Sentence: The land was secured soon after, some 200-plus acres of former citrus grove, next to Atlantic Ridge State Park.

Article Title: Michael Jordan’s ultra-private, ultra-exclusive personal golf course: The Grove XXIII
Sentence: As he often does for projects, Weed lived on site, making the 265-mile switch across the state from Ponte Vedra Beach.

Article Title: Michael Jordan’s ultra-private, ultra-exclusive personal golf course: The Grove XXIII
Sentence: Weed was all-in, and encouraged Jordan to be as engaged as he wanted to be in developments, inviting him to come out once weekly to track the progress.

Article Title: Michael Jordan’s ultra-private, ultra-exclusive personal golf course: The Grove XXIII
Sentence: Jordan often visited multiple times a week.

Article Title: Michael Jordan’s ultra-private, ultra-exclusive personal golf course: The Grove XXIII
Sentence: Jordan, pictured in March 2023, has a well-documented love of golf.

Article Title: Michael Jordan’s ultra-private, ultra-exclusive personal golf course: The Grove XXIII
Sentence:
Jacob Kupferman/Getty Images

Weed likens his role as course architect to that of a quarterback: calling plays for a large roster of consultants.

Article Title: Michael Jordan’s ultra-private, ultra-exclusive personal golf course: The Grove XXIII
Sentence: Watching Jordan in discussion with the team during one early meeting, he got the impression of a coach interacting with his players.

Article Title: Michael Jordan’s ultra-private, ultra-exclusive personal golf course: The Grove XXIII
Sentence: “I think one of his qualities is he was such a good listener, and he absorbed everything that you were discussing,” Weed said.

Article Title: Michael Jordan’s ultra-private, ultra-exclusive personal golf course: The Grove XXIII
Sentence: “He didn’t come out and say ‘do this or do that.’

Article Title: Michael Jordan’s ultra-private, ultra-exclusive personal golf course: The Grove XXIII
Sentence: He came out and observed and was a great listener, and he let me do my job.”

Article Title: Michael Jordan’s ultra-private, ultra-exclusive personal golf course: The Grove XXIII
Sentence: Weed evaluates his plan for the course.

Article Title: Michael Jordan’s ultra-private, ultra-exclusive personal golf course: The Grove XXIII
Sentence:
Bobby Weed Golf Design

“Slaughterhouse 23”

Weed had his two pillars for a great golf course — an engaged owner and a good piece of property, though the latter would require some polishing.

Article Title: Michael Jordan’s ultra-private, ultra-exclusive personal golf course: The Grove XXIII
Sentence: Turning a flat, “featureless” site – bordered by two long drainage canals – into a cross between the manicured, parkland style of Augusta National and the rustic layout of Pine Valley represented the greatest challenge to him and his team.

Article Title: Michael Jordan’s ultra-private, ultra-exclusive personal golf course: The Grove XXIII
Sentence: Dirt was excavated from lagoons to build the course and its features, fixing the flatness issue and leaving behind six large lakes – the same number of NBA Championships Jordan won.

Article Title: Michael Jordan’s ultra-private, ultra-exclusive personal golf course: The Grove XXIII
Sentence: It was a coincidence, but ultimately fit the theme of a course tuned to the finest degree to its owner’s style.

Article Title: Michael Jordan’s ultra-private, ultra-exclusive personal golf course: The Grove XXIII
Sentence: Jordan wanted firm and fast, a course that could both excite and challenge its members, many of whom would be among the PGA Tour’s current stars.

Article Title: Michael Jordan’s ultra-private, ultra-exclusive personal golf course: The Grove XXIII
Sentence: A double-helix layout, with a “crossover” at the 5th and 14th holes, offers the flexibility to play continual internal circuits in three, six, or nine-hole loops – ideal for Jordan’s busy schedule.

Article Title: Michael Jordan’s ultra-private, ultra-exclusive personal golf course: The Grove XXIII
Sentence: Two irrigation canals border the site.

Article Title: Michael Jordan’s ultra-private, ultra-exclusive personal golf course: The Grove XXIII
Sentence: Bobby Weed Golf Design

Article Title: Michael Jordan’s ultra-private, ultra-exclusive personal golf course: The Grove XXIII
Sentence: The course didn’t just need to suit the playstyle of its owner, though, it needed to enhance it.

Article Title: Michael Jordan’s ultra-private, ultra-exclusive personal golf course: The Grove XXIII
Sentence: “You don’t think I’m going to spend this much money and not have a little bit of an advantage do you?”

Article Title: Michael Jordan’s ultra-private, ultra-exclusive personal golf course: The Grove XXIII
Sentence: Weed recalled Jordan saying.

Article Title: Michael Jordan’s ultra-private, ultra-exclusive personal golf course: The Grove XXIII
Sentence:
Add to that the five-time MVP’s penchant for wagers, which will be familiar to viewers of docuseries “The Last Dance,” and the course has earned a new name among some members: “Slaughterhouse 23.”

“It’s his golf course, so it’s set up very well for him,” former world No. 1

Article Title: Michael Jordan’s ultra-private, ultra-exclusive personal golf course: The Grove XXIII
Sentence: Rickie Fowler told the Subpar podcast in 2020.

Article Title: Michael Jordan’s ultra-private, ultra-exclusive personal golf course: The Grove XXIII
Sentence: Weed, too, got drawn into the wagers, even during construction.

Article Title: Michael Jordan’s ultra-private, ultra-exclusive personal golf course: The Grove XXIII
Sentence: “I can remember us being out there hitting shots and doing a little gambling while we were just playing in the dirt.

Article Title: Michael Jordan’s ultra-private, ultra-exclusive personal golf course: The Grove XXIII
Sentence: It was just great fun and interaction,” he said.

Article Title: Michael Jordan’s ultra-private, ultra-exclusive personal golf course: The Grove XXIII

Article Title: Michael Jordan’s ultra-private, ultra-exclusive personal golf course: The Grove XXIII
Sentence:
Bobby Weed Golf Design

To meet the second requirement of Jordan’s brief, Weed’s team set aside 20 acres to construct a state-of-the-art practice facility that the designer believes has no equal.

Article Title: Michael Jordan’s ultra-private, ultra-exclusive personal golf course: The Grove XXIII
Sentence: Two 400-yard, double-sided driving lanes can be maintained for specific conditions, such as US Open or PGA Tour style fairways, with “target greens” in 25-yard increments.

Article Title: Michael Jordan’s ultra-private, ultra-exclusive personal golf course: The Grove XXIII
Sentence: Each green has built-in pods that can track swathes of shot information, incorporating the PGA Tour’s ShotLink data.

Article Title: Michael Jordan’s ultra-private, ultra-exclusive personal golf course: The Grove XXIII
Sentence: The putting green is split into four quadrants, with incremental slopes ranging from 0-1% to 3-4% inclines.

Article Title: Michael Jordan’s ultra-private, ultra-exclusive personal golf course: The Grove XXIII
Sentence: Even the grass on the tees is customizable, with different types to mimic warm or cool seasons.

Article Title: Michael Jordan’s ultra-private, ultra-exclusive personal golf course: The Grove XXIII
Sentence: “It’s a Tour player’s haven to work on their game,” said Weed.

Article Title: Michael Jordan’s ultra-private, ultra-exclusive personal golf course: The Grove XXIII
Sentence: Jordan wanted an elite practice facility.

Article Title: Michael Jordan’s ultra-private, ultra-exclusive personal golf course: The Grove XXIII
Sentence:
Bobby Weed Golf Design

Taking a swing

Compared to Bobby Weed Golf Design, Nichols Architects had considerably less experience in golf courses, but it did have one key advantage in its efforts to beat other bids to build The Grove XXIII’s clubhouse.

Article Title: Michael Jordan’s ultra-private, ultra-exclusive personal golf course: The Grove XXIII
Sentence: Specializing in hospitality, residential, and commercial design, the firm had worked on the W South Beach in Miami — the favorite hotel of Jordan’s wife Yvette Prieto.

Article Title: Michael Jordan’s ultra-private, ultra-exclusive personal golf course: The Grove XXIII
Sentence: The team pulled no punches with its pitch to Jordan.

Article Title: Michael Jordan’s ultra-private, ultra-exclusive personal golf course: The Grove XXIII
Sentence: “You’re not going to confuse this clubhouse with a clubhouse down the road or anything like that, and that’s what we’re selling you,” planning and design partner Igor Reyes told CNN of the pitching process, likening it to that depicted in the “Air” movie, where Nike must lure a rookie Jordan away from a deal with Adidas.

Article Title: Michael Jordan’s ultra-private, ultra-exclusive personal golf course: The Grove XXIII
Sentence: “You’ve really got to make an architectural iconic shape, and a shape that you could almost immediately feel was swinging across the landscape.

Article Title: Michael Jordan’s ultra-private, ultra-exclusive personal golf course: The Grove XXIII
Sentence: Hopefully you can almost read the concept without anybody having to tell you,” Reyes said.

Article Title: Michael Jordan’s ultra-private, ultra-exclusive personal golf course: The Grove XXIII
Sentence: The deal clincher — outlined to Jordan in a pitch video — was that clubhouse shape, inspired by the smooth, “almost machine-like” perfection of a golf swing.

Article Title: Michael Jordan’s ultra-private, ultra-exclusive personal golf course: The Grove XXIII
Sentence: An early concept of the swing-inspired clubhouse shape.

Reyes said his team had heard of Jordan’s purported early struggles with his swing, and, in the video, set up a column grid to map the building’s structure onto Tiger Woods’ club trajectory.

Article Title: Michael Jordan’s ultra-private, ultra-exclusive personal golf course: The Grove XXIII
Sentence: Jordan was captivated, and told the firm there and then that it would get the contract.

Article Title: Michael Jordan’s ultra-private, ultra-exclusive personal golf course: The Grove XXIII
Sentence: “The first time you walk into the room with him, you don’t want to get too close or anything like that, it was kind of an odd thing,” Reyes said.

Article Title: Michael Jordan’s ultra-private, ultra-exclusive personal golf course: The Grove XXIII
Sentence: “But by the second or third meeting we were just talking to him like a ‘regular’ client with a huge amount of respect.

Article Title: Michael Jordan’s ultra-private, ultra-exclusive personal golf course: The Grove XXIII
Sentence: “There was a really a sense of, ‘This isn’t just a guy with a lot of money that wants to do something.

Article Title: Michael Jordan’s ultra-private, ultra-exclusive personal golf course: The Grove XXIII
Sentence: This guy knows what he’s doing, he knows what he likes, and how to get to it.’

Sentence:
”

Nichols Architects was determined to create an iconic design.
